src: I became a Law and Order fan in 2011.
mt: Nilikuwa mmoja wa wafuasi wa mfululizo wa Law and Order mwaka 2011.
ref: Nilianza kuwa shabiki wa Law and Order mwaka wa 2011.

src: Everybody loved Bob because he played a popular character on film.
mt: Kila mtu alivijua Bob kwa sababu alicheza kijibu cha kipenzi kwenye filamu.
ref: Kila mtu alimpenda Bob kwa sababu aliigiza mtu maarufu kwenye filamu.

src: Lita wanted to watch her favorite show on television.
mt: Lita alitaka kufurahia mchezo wake ulio wazi kwenye televisheni.
ref: Lita alitaka kutazama kipindi chake akipendacho kwenye runinga.

src: Liv jumped as she was startled by a loud pop.
mt: Liv alimkata tamaa kama alivuruga kwa kipusa.
ref: Liv aliruka kwa kuwa alishtuliwa na mshindo mkubwa.

src: Mother told her children it would be lunchtime in fifteen minutes.
mt: Mama alisema kwamba itakuwa saa ya chakula kwa dakika 15.
ref: Mama aliwaelezea watoto wake itakuwa wakati wa chakula cha mchana baada ya dakika kumi na tano.

src: Hector has always bought coffee at a local shop before work.
mt: Hector anayetunza kula kopi katika duka la kijiji kabla ya kazi.
ref: Hector amekuwa akinunua kahawa katika duka la karibu kabla ya kwenda kazi.

src: Kelly found out there was a new girl at school.
mt: Kelly alijua kuna jamaa mpya katika shule.
ref: Kelly aligundua kwamba kulikuwa na msichana mgeni shuleni.

src: Tommy trained hard to run his first 5K.
mt: Tommy alitayarisha kwa kasi ili aendelee na kwanza kufanya 5K.
ref: Tommy alifanya mazoezi kwa bidii ili kukimbia K5 zake za kwanza.

src: Laurie is going to her first formal dance tonight.
mt: Laurie anatarajia kufika kwa kwanza kwenye dansi ya rasmi leo.
ref: Laurie anaenda kwa densi yake ya kwanza rasmi leo usiku.

src: Neil was exploring historic railroads.
mt: Neil alikuwa anavyoendesha madaraja ya historia.
ref: Neil alikuwa akichunguza barabara za kihistoria za reli.

src: Bob dreaded his first day working at a fast food fish joint.
mt: Bob alitukana kwanza siku yake ya kazi katika chumba cha kuchoma samaki.
ref: Bob alihofia siku yake ya kwanza ya kufanya kazi katika mkahawa wa samaki wanaotayarishwa upesi.

src: A friend came to visit.
mt: Mtu mmoja alikuja kwa kushikilia.
ref: Rafiki alikuja kutembea.

src: Lester has always wanted to be more artistic.
mt: Lester ameomba kufanya zaidi kama mchongaji.
ref: Lester ametaka sana kuwa msanifu zaidi.

src: Pablo likes to eat worms.
mt: Pablo anapenda kula nyoka.
ref: Pablo anapenda kula funza.

src: Kira always loved Japanese culture.
mt: Kira alikuwa na uongozi wa kisiasa.
ref: Kira anapenda utamaduni wa Japani.

src: Glen was in the mood for a walk.
mt: Glen alikuwa katika hali ya kuwinda.
ref: Glen alikuwa katika hali ya kutembea.

src: Jesus spent the day polishing the furniture.
mt: Yesu alipuliza zana za vitu vya kifalme.
ref: Jesus alitumia siku yake akingarisha fanicha.

src: I was walking to the store recently.
mt: Nilikuwa nikitembea kuelekea duka la kawaida.
ref: Nilikuwa nikitembea dukani hivi karibuni.

src: Gina's sister cut her ankle on broken glass.
mt: Gina's sister cut her ankle on broken glass.
ref: Dadake Gina alijikata kwenye fundo lake la mguu kwenye glasi iliyopasuka.

src: A little boy was in the third grade.
mt: Kijana mdogo alikuwa katika daraja la tatu.
ref: Mvulana mdogo alikuwa katika gredi ya tatu.

src: Rosie's class was having a little party.
mt: Klasa ya Rosie ilikuwa inafanya shamba la kichwa.
ref: Darasa la Rosie lilikuwa na sherehe ndogo.

src: Kelly was happy to have her new phone.
mt: Kelly alikuwa na furaha kwa kupata simu yake mpya.
ref: Kelly alifurahi kuwa na simu yake mpya.

src: While I was in college, I had met an older man.
mt: Kwa sasa, nilipokwenda chuo, nilijifunua na mwanamume mwenye umri mkubwa.
ref: Nilipokuwa chuoni, nilikutana na mwanaume mzee.

src: Bob wanted to be in the school play.
mt: Bob alitaka kuwa katika tamasha la shule.
ref: Bob alitaka kuwa katika mchezo wa kuigiza wa shule.

src: Jackie has been designated eighth grade hall monitor.
mt: Jackie ameajiliwa kama mwenyezi kwa mabara ya daraja la kwanza.
ref: Jackie amepewa kazi ya msimamizi wa ukumbi wa gredi ya nane.

src: My dad had just gotten a new car.
mt: Baba yangu alikuwa ameipata gari mpya.
ref: Baba yangu alikuwa amepata gari jipya.

src: My niece loves the Frozen movie.
mt: Jamaa yangu anayemiliki mimi anapenda filamu ya Frozen.
ref: Mpwa wangu anapenda filamu ya Frozen.

src: Alex was dribbling up the court, with his team down two points.
mt: Alex alikuwa akifurika kwenye baraza, na timu yake ikikuwa na madhara mbili.
ref: Alex alikuwa akicheza mpira uwanjani, timu yake ikiwa iko chini kwa pointi mbili.

src: I came into the library and took a seat.
mt: Nilipofika katika chumba cha vitabu nilichukua kituo.
ref: Niliingia katika maktaba na nikachukua kiti.

src: Iva and Brant were trying to conceive a child.
mt: Iva na Brant walikuwa wakipenda kuzaa mtoto.
ref: Iva na Brant walikuwa wakijaribu kupata mtoto.

src: Catherine has always been intrigued by the sport of Curling.
mt: Catherine ameendelea kuwa na hamu kwa mchezo wa Curling.
ref: Catherine amekuwa akishangazwa na mchezo wa Curling.

src: Francis has always looked forward to learning how to drive.
mt: Francis alikuwa anamshangaa kujifunza kwa nini kufanya kazi.
ref: Francis amekuwa akitazamia kujifunza jinsi ya kuendesha gari.

src: Yesterday I had a great time seeing The Nutcracker.
mt: Jana nilikuwa na muda mzuri kwa kuona The Nutcracker.
ref: Jina nilikuwa na wakati mzuri wa kutazama The Nutcracker.

src: I woke up for my class at 8:30 in the morning.
mt: Nilipokwama kwa kazi yangu ya kwanza kwa saa 8:30 asubuhi.
ref: Niliamka ili kwenda kwa darasa langu saa 8:30 asubuhi.

src: Gary wanted to get Lisa's attention.
mt: Gary alitaka kufikiriwa na Lisa.
ref: Gary alitaka kumvutia Lisa.

src: Carlos has always wanted to visit France.
mt: Carlos alivyotaka kufika Ufaransa.
ref: Carlos ametaka sana kutembelea Ufaransa.

src: Lars had always wanted to try photography.
mt: Lars alikuwa anataka kujifunza kuwa na picha.
ref: Lars amekuwa akitaka sana kuwa mpiga picha.

src: I bought a television from an electronics store.
mt: Nilipata televisheni kutoka katika duka la elektroniki.
ref: Nilinunua runinga kutoka kwa duka la elektroniki.

src: Ryan was at a park.
mt: Ryan alikuwa katika parki.
ref: Ryan alikuwa kwenye bustani.

src: Jen's manager told her she needed to upload her resume.
mt: Meneja wa Jen alimwambia atakayeongeza kwa kutoa taarifa yake.
ref: Meneja wa Jen alimwambia alihitaji kupakia wasifu-kazi wake.

src: Neil was touring the city of Fez.
mt: Neil alikuwa akifanya safari katika mji wa Fez.
ref: Neil alikuwa akisafiri jiji la Fez.

src: I needed to take my dog for a walk.
mt: Nilizidi kuchukua mbwa wangu kwa barabara.
ref: Nilitaka kumpeleka mbwa wangu kutembea.

src: It was a bright, warm day.
mt: Ilikuwa siku ya joto na nyota.
ref: Ilikuwa siku nzuri, yenye joto.

src: Jen was waiting for a package all day.
mt: Jen alikuwa akimwamini pakiti kwa siku nzima.
ref: Jen alikuwa akisuburi mzigo wake siku nzima.

src: Frank did not want to do his homework.
mt: Frank alikuwa hajitaka kufanya kazi yake.
ref: Frank hakutaka kufanya kazi yake ya nyumbani.

src: Timmy was competing in the 3 point competition at his school.
mt: Timmy alikuwa akicheza katika mashindano ya kipindi cha tatu cha shule yake.
ref: Timmy alikuwa akishindana katika shindano la alama 3 katika shule yake.

src: Drake attended a party on Friday.
mt: Drake alifika katika kipindi cha jumatatu.
ref: Drake alihudhuria sherehe Ijumaa.

src: Bob discovered his truck had a flat tire.
mt: Bob alijua kwamba gari lake lina kipande cha kivuli.
ref: Bob aligundua gari lake lilikuwa na pancha.

src: Jack is tired of writing emails on his tablet computer.
mt: Jack anapendelea kutumia kompyuta ya kawaida kuliko kompyuta ya kawaida.
ref: Jack amechoka kuandika barua pepe kwenye kompyuta yake kibao.

src: Jake's hair was getting a bit too long.
mt: Jakes hair ilikuwa inakua kwa wingi.
ref: Nywele ya Jake ilikuwa inakuwa refu sana.

src: Sean came over today.
mt: Sean alipita leo.
ref: Sean alikuja leo.

src: Sarah wanted to mail a card.
mt: Sarah alitaka kufanya kazi ya posta.
ref: Sarah alitaka kutuma kadi.

src: Chuck was tired from working.
mt: Chuck alikuwa na uwezo mkubwa kutokana na kufanya kazi.
ref: Chuck alikuwa amechoka kufanya kazi.

src: Bob used plastic grocery bags to go shopping.
mt: Bob alitumia barabara za plastiki za biashara kwa ajili ya kupata bidhaa.
ref: Bob alitumia mifuko ya mboga ya plastiki kwenda kununua.

src: Joe needed to get a portrait of himself for a project.
mt: Joe alitaka kujipima kwa picha ya kichwa kwa kazi.
ref: Joe alihitaji kupata picha yake mwenyewe kwa ajili ya mradi.

src: Ann was trying to quit smoking.
mt: Ann alikuwa anajaribu kujiondoa kuuza dawa.
ref: Ann alikuwa akijaribu kuacha kuvuta sigara.

src: Jen got sent to her aunt's for the summer.
mt: Jen alitupwa kwa binti yake kwa mwezi.
ref: Jen alipelekwa kwa shangazi yake kuwa huko kwa majira ya joto.

src: Yesterday was Rob's tooth cleaning.
mt: Jana ilikuwa kufanya kuchimba kwa Rob.
ref: Jana ilikuwa siku ya kusafisha jino la Rob.

src: Joe loved to eat dirt.
mt: Joe alivuta kula nchi.
ref: Joe alipenda kula uchafu.

src: Rob has never been on a rollercoaster.
mt: Rob hakuwa kwenye rollercoaster.
ref: Rob hajawahi kuwa kwenye gari-bembea.

src: Carly was waiting for Sam to call her.
mt: Carly alikuwa akimwamini Sam atakaye piga simu.
ref: Carly alikuwa akimsubiri Sam kumpigia simu.

src: Amy came home from school on her birthday to an empty house.
mt: Amy alikwenda nyumbani kutoka shule kwa siku yake kama ilivyopaswa kwa nyumba bila mtu.
ref: Amy akaja nyumbani kutoka shuleni siku yake ya kuzaliwa kwa nyumba tupu.

src: Pan tried to hit me for no apparent reason.
mt: Pan alimkata kwa sababu isiyoweza kujitambulisha.
ref: Pan alijaribu kunigonga bila sababu yoyote.

mt: Becky ana dada yake jina lake ni Ashley.

ref: Mtoto wa Pam na Tom alikuwa halali sana.

src: May was accepted to college in Fredonia.
mt: Mei alipewa kuhudhuria chuo kikuu cha Fredonia.

src: Mary needed to have teeth pulled.
mt: Mary alitaka kutoa nywele.

src: Ford was proud of his high GPA.
mt: Ford alikuwa na furaha kwa kugundua kwa GPA yake.

src: My wife says I lack passion.
mt: Mke yangu anasema nina uhaba wa hisia.

ref: Ilikuwa siku nzuri ya majira ya kuchipua mapema Machi.

src: Bob was really thirsty and wanted a soda.
mt: Bob alikuwa na shida kubwa ya kupumua na alitaka soda.

src: Jim was waiting at the airport.
mt: Jim alikuwa akimwamini uwanja wa ndege.
ref: Jim alikuwa akisubiri kwenye uwanja wa ndege.

mt: Joe alikuwa na hamu kubakia Chuo Kikuu cha Columbia.

mt: Gina's friend Tami had a folder she didn't want anyone else to have.

mt: Leah alikuwa na mti wa kwanza kama vile mti wa kwanza katika nyumba yake.

mt: Peter alikuwa ameusitisha kiti hicho kwa miaka mingi.

mt: Rex anatarajia kufanya sherehe leo jioni.

mt: Ali anapata kila siku kwa reli kufika kazi.

mt: Timu ya mpira wa miguu ilifanya kazi kwa kasi kote msimu.
ref: Timu ya futiboli ya Marekani ilikuwa imefanya kazi kwa bidii msimu wote.

src: We live in a high rise building.
mt: Hatuna nyumba ya juu.
ref: Tunaishi katika jengo ndefu la ghorofa.

src: Kate wanted to buy a new keyboard for her computer.
mt: Kate alitaka kupata kiboradini mpya kwa kompyuta yake.
ref: Kate alitaka kununua kibodi mpya ya kompyuta yake.

src: Jon graduated from college and began his job search.
mt: Jon alipata shahada kutoka chuo na kuanza kujitafutia kazi.
ref: Jon alihitimu kutoka chuo cha elimu na kuanza kutafuta kazi.

src: Julie loved to read anything she could get her hands on.
mt: Julie alivuta kusoma yote anayoweza kupata.
ref: Julie alipenda kusoma kitu chochote ambacho angeweza kupata.

src: Amy's family was going to Six Flags.
mt: Kazini familia ya Amy ilikuwa inakwenda Six Flags.
ref: Familia ya Amy ilikuwa ikienda Six Flags.

src: Steve was in a hurry to get to the football game.
mt: Steve alikuwa na shida kwa kufika katika mechi ya mpira.
ref: Steve alikuwa na haraka ya kufika kwenye mchezo wa mpira wa miguu.

src: My daughter went to her first birthday party for a friend.
mt: Jina langu linaenda kwa mara ya kwanza kwa sherehe ya kuzaliwa kwa mpenzi.
ref: Binti yangu alienda kwa sherehe yake ya kwanza ya siku ya kuzaliwa kwa rafiki.

mt: Bob alitaka pesa ili kupata chakula.
ref: Bob alihitaji pesa za kununua chakula.

src: I just completed my first marathon today.
mt: Nilifikia marafiki yangu ya kwanza leo.
ref: Nimekamilisha tu mbio zangu za kwanza za masafa marefu leo.

mt: Bobby alifunza nafaka yake ya kipande cha mafuta kwa ajili ya ndege.
ref: Bobby alikuja msokoto wake wa matunda kwa umbo la ndege.

src: Sam was stargazing one night.
mt: Sam alikuwa anavyofurahia nyota mmoja usiku.
ref: Sam alikuwa akiangalia nyota usiku mmoja.

src: John and Meg had dated for five Year's.
mt: John na Meg waliwiana kwa miaka minne.
ref: Jonn na Meg walikuwa wamechumbiana kwa Miaka mitano.

mt: Kifungu cha kibao cha matunda ya nazi kimepanga kwa kujitofautisha.

ref: Rhonda alinunua soksi mpya za pinki za kuvaa.

src: The sea was frightening during a storm.
mt: Bahari ilikuwa kama kujivinjari wakati wa mvua.
ref: Bahari lilikuwa likitisha wakati wa dhoruba.

src: Yesterday, Anna decided to take a nap.
mt: Jana Anna alisema atakaa kwa muda.
ref: Jana, Anna aliamua kulala kidogo.

src: Chuck loves this bar by his house.
mt: Chuck anapenda bar hii karibu na nyumba yake.
ref: Chuck anapenda baa hii iliyo karibu na nyumba yake.

src: Steve was sitting in the cafe.
mt: Steve alikuwa akifika katika kafe.
ref: Steve alikuwa amekaa mkahawani.

src: John was driving to the store when he realized he forgot his wallet.
mt: John alikuwa anavyoendesha gari kwenda duka wakati akajua ameacha mapesa yake.
ref: John alikuwa akiendesha gari kwenda dukani alipogundua alikuwa amesahau pochi lake.

mt: Tom alikuwa anapenda vitabu vya kujenga wakati wake wa kujifunza.
ref: Tom alifurahia mafumbo alipokuwa akikua.

src: Gina was bored while cleaning her room.
mt: Gina alikuwa na shida wakati wa kufanya kazi za kujitafutia.
ref: Gina alikuwa ameboeka akisafisha chumba chake.

src: A small snowstorm came through a town.
mt: Barafu ya kichwani kilichokwenda kwa mji.
ref: Dhoruba ndogo ya theluji ilipitia mji.

src: My birthday was yesterday.
mt: Jana nilikuwa na siku yangu ya kuzaliwa.
ref: Siku yangu ya kuzaliwa ilikuwa jana.

src: My mother threw out her old dictionary.
mt: Mama yangu alitupa kamusi yake ya zamani.
ref: Mama yangu alitupa kamusi yangu ya zamani.

src: Our parents took us to Paragon Park in 1963.
mt: Wazazi wetu walimwambia wakati wa 1963.
ref: Wazazi wetu walitupeleka Bustani ya Paragon mwaka wa 1963.

src: My favorite movie is the Wizard of Oz.
mt: Filimu yangu ya kibinafsi ni Mchungaji wa Oz.
ref: Filamu yangu niipendayo ni Wizard of Oz.

src: Mary Ann went for a walk on a trail at the park.
mt: Mary Ann alipita kwa barabara katika mazingira ya parki.
ref: Mary Ann alienda kutembea kwenye kijia cha bustani.

src: One day, a dog moved into a family that had two cats.
mt: Moja anayefika, mbwa alijitokeza katika familia ambayo ilikuwa na wanyama wawili.
ref: Siku moja, mbwa alihamia familia ambayo ilikuwa na paka wawili.

src: My favorite animal is the Arabian Oryx.
mt: Hasa kama wanyama ni Oryx wa Kiarabu.
ref: Mnyama wangu ninayependa ni Choroa wa Arabia.

src: Everyday, I nag my daughter to do her homework.
mt: Kila siku, ninamwambia binti yangu kufanya kazi yake ya kila siku.
ref: Kila siku, ninamsumbua binti yangu afanye kazi yake ya nyumbani.

src: A young boy wanted to pitch for his baseball team.
mt: Kijana alikuwa na ahadi ya kucheza kwa timu yake ya mpira wa kikapu.
ref: Mvulana mdogo alitaka kuwa mrusha mpira katika timu yake ya besiboli.

src: Sue woke up in the middle of the night to an awful smell.
mt: Sue alipokwama katika usiku wa kati kwa upeo mwingi.
ref: Sue aliamshwa katikati ya usiku na harufu mbaya.

src: Mark notices that his teeth are beginning to hurt one day.
mt: Mark anashuhudia kwamba zile zake za kawaida zimeanza kuchanganywa siku moja.
ref: Mark aligundua kwamba meno yake yameanza kuuma siku moja.

src: Lulu had just moved into her new home.
mt: Lulu alikuwa anafika katika nyumba yake mpya.
ref: Lulu alikuwa amehamia tu nyumba yake mpya.

src: Farmer Bill called out the the cows in the field.
mt: Kabila Bill alituma kwa punda katika mti.
ref: Mkulima Bill aliwaita ngombe shambani.

src: Terry left the hospital frustrated and disheartened.
mt: Terry alisahau hospitali na hasira na kuharibika.
ref: Terry aliondoka hospitalini akiwa amefadhaika na amevunjika moyo.

src: Mary has worked at a car dealership for two Year's without selling.
mt: Mary amekuwa anafanya kazi katika biashara ya gari kwa miaka mitatu bila kufanya biashara yoyote.
ref: Mary amefanya kazi katika kampuni ya kuuza magari kwa miaka miwili bila kuuza.

src: Brie and her cat moved in with her boyfriend and his cat.
mt: Brie na kiti chake wakapata nyumba na mpenzi wake na kiti chake.
ref: Brie na paka wake walihamia kwa mpenzi wake na paka wake.

src: Tim needed a new kitchen floor.
mt: Tim alitaka mabati mpya kwa kifani chake.
ref: Tim alihitaji sakafu mpya ya jikoni.

src: Dave decided one day he wanted to go see a nickelback show.
mt: Dave alisema siku moja alikuwa na ahadi ya kuona mchezo wa nickelback.
ref: Dave aliamua siku moja anataka kwenda kuona onyesho la nickelback.

src: There is a cemetery with 199 grave stones.
mt: Kuna kaburi na 199 nyumba za kaburi.
ref: Kuna makaburi yenye mawe 199 ya kaburi.

src: Joe felt confident going into his boxing match.
mt: Joe alikuwa na uaminifu kama alivyoingia katika mashindano yake ya kikapaa.
ref: Joe alihisi ana ujasiri kwenda kwenye mechi yake ya ndondi.

src: The nastiest thing happened to Jimmy.
mt: Jambo la ajabu liliongea na Jimmy.
ref: Kitu kibaya zaidi kilimfanyikia Jimmy.

mt: Jamaa yangu alifanya kazi katika mashindano ya gari la kujenga kwa wakulima.
ref: Mtoto wangu wa kiume alishiriki katika shindano la magari ya kuchezea la Skauti wa Cub.

src: Brian tried out for the hockey team this year.

ref: Brian alijaribu kujiunga na timu ya mchezo wa magongo mwaka huu.

ref: Kelly alikuwa akiteleza kwenye barafu aliposikia kwa ghafla rabsha kubwa nyumba yake.

ref: Ellen alikuwa na mtoto msichana aliyekuwa akilala katika kitanda cha watoto ndani ya chumba chake.

mt: Sally anamini kiongozi wake anataka kifuta.
ref: Sally anaamini bosi wake anajaribu kumfuta kazi.

src: We decided we would learn to make candy.
mt: Tukapata kwamba tutakwenda kujifunza kufanya mafuta.
ref: Tuliamua tutajifunza kutengeneza pipi.

src: Will was very wild in kindergarten, and did not listen to his teacher.

mt: Emily alikuwa na wasiwasi sana kujipata shot zake katika ofisi ya daktari.

src: My friends and I were playing outside.
mt: Wanawake wangu na mimi tulikuwa tunacheza nje.

ref: Siku moja, kipanya cha kompyuta yangu kiliacha kufanya kazi.

src: Samantha was driving to class.
mt: Samanta alikuwa anavyoendesha gari kwenda kwa kazi.
ref: Samantha alikuwa akiendesha kuelekea darasani.

mt: Nilikuwa ni mara yangu ya kwanza kufurika na nilikuwa si kama bora.

src: Gabe needed a desk in his room.
mt: Gabe alitaka meza katika chumba chake.
ref: Gabe alihitaji dawati chumbani kwake.

src: Rick told his friends that he hated camping.
mt: Rick alisema kwa wenzake kwamba alikuwa na hasira na kufanya kambi.
ref: Rick aliwaambia marafiki wake kwamba alikuwa anachukia kupiga kambi.

src: Jerry wanted to start a new career.
mt: Jerry alitaka kuanza kazi mpya.
ref: Jerry alitaka kuanza kazi mpya.

src: Emile wanted to be a great chef.
mt: Emile alitaka kuwa mchekeshaji mkubwa.
ref: Emile alitaka kuwa mpishi mzuri.

src: Ella had packed a picnic for her family.
mt: Ella alipanga chakula cha kwanza kwa familia yake.
ref: Ella alikuwa amefunga mandari ya familia yake.

src: Emily woke up early to get ready for school last Monday.
mt: Emily alipokwama asubuhi alikuwa tayari kwa shule jumatatu.
ref: Emily aliamka mapema kujiandaa kwenda shule Jumatatu iliyopita.

src: Joline went to the nail salon to get a manicure.
mt: Joline alipata kufika kwa kuchukua manikuri.
ref: Joline alienda kwenye saluni ya kucha ili kufanyiwa utunzaji wa mikono na kucha.

src: Harry secretly hated haunted houses, but couldn't let his friend down.
mt: Harry alikuwa akisababisha hasira kwa nyumba za wanyama, lakini hakutaki kudhalilisha rafiki yake.
ref: Harry alichukia kwa siri nyumba zenye majini, lakini hakuweza kumvunja moyo rafiki wake.

src: Bobby wanted to be a wrestler.
mt: Bobby alitaka kuwa mshambuliaji.
ref: Bobby alitaka kuwa mpigaji.

src: Joan decided to treat herself to a fancy sushi dinner.
mt: Joan aliamua kujitunza kwa chakula cha sushini cha kawaida.
ref: Joan aliamua kujishughulikia na chakula cha jioni cha kupendeza cha sushi.

src: Jesse had always wanted to get a tattoo.
mt: Jesse alikuwa anataka kufanya kile kile.
ref: Jesse amekuwa akitaka sana kuchora tattoo.

src: Juliette wanted to be a scientist when she grew up.
mt: Juliette alitaka kuwa mwanasayansi wakati akiwa na umri wa kujenga.
ref: Juliette alitaka kuwa mwanasayansi alipokua.

src: Jaclyn came over to hang out with Robs girlfriend.
mt: Jaclyn alipita kwa ajili ya kushirikiana na Robs mke.
ref: Jaclyn alikuja kubarizi na mpenzi wa Robs.

src: Sharon and her sister drove to the grocery store to pick up eggs.
mt: Sharon na ndugu yake walikuwa wakifika duka la kujikimu kujua kama watajua mayai.
ref: Sharon na dada yake waliendesha kwenda kwenye duka kununua mayai.

src: There once was a slave trader.
mt: Kuna mtu mmoja aliyekuwa na biashara ya watumwa.
ref: Kulikuwa na mfanyabiashara wa watumwa.

src: Ella went out sledding one afternoon.
mt: Ella alipita kwenye mabati mmoja kwa mchana.
ref: Ella alienda kutelezea juu ya theluji siku moja alasiri.

src: Steph usually ate a large breakfast.
mt: Steph kwa kawaida alikula chakula cha mchana kikubwa.
ref: Kawaida Steph alikula kiamsha kinywa kikubwa.

src: Bobby was a star football player at his school.
mt: Bobby alikuwa mchezaji bora wa mpira wa kikapu katika shule yake.
ref: Bobby alikuwa mchezaji maarufu wa mpira wa miguu shuleni kwake.

src: Susan went to the movie theater with her friends.
mt: Susan alipata ndege na wenzake.
ref: Susan alienda kwenye jumba la sinema pamoja na marafiki zake.

src: Margie had a Christmas cactus.
mt: Margie alikuwa na kikuyu cha Krismasi.
ref: Margie alikuwa na dungusi kakati ya Krismasi.

src: Gina had been at the park with her friend Pam for hours.
mt: Gina alikuwa katika parki na mpenzi yake Pam kwa masaa mengi.
ref: Gina alikuwa kwenye bustani hiyo na rafiki yake Pam kwa saa kadhaa.

src: Avery was very excited.
mt: Avery alikuwa na furaha kubwa.
ref: Avery alisisimka sana.

src: Gary loved to garden.
mt: Gary alivuta kufanya kilimo.
ref: Gary alipenda kulima.

src: Bay was nervous.
mt: Bay alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Vay alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: Tommy was having a bad day.
mt: Tommy alikuwa na siku mbaya.
ref: Tommy alikuwa na siku mbaya.

src: Ariel is our 5 month old baby.
mt: Ariel ni mtoto wetu wa miaka 5.
ref: Ariel ni mtoto wetu wa umri wa miezi 5.

src: Amelia decided to take a vacation to Mexico.
mt: Amelia aliamua kufanya safari ya kipindi kwa Mexiko.
ref: Amelia aliamua kuchukua likizo kwenda Mexico.

src: Sometimes my kids wondered if Santa Claus was real.
mt: Maradhi mara nyingi watoto wangu wanasema kama Santa Claus ni asili.
ref: Wakati mwingine watoto wangu walijiuliza ikiwa Santa Claus alikuwa wa kweli.

src: Amy woke up extra hungry today.
mt: Amy alipona na nguvu zaidi leo.
ref: Amy aliamka akiwa na njaa zaidi leo.

src: The school received a grant to make a computer lab.
mt: Shule ilipata mkopo ili kufanya jumba la kompyuta.
ref: Shule ilipokea ruzuku ya kutengeneza maabara ya kompyuta.

src: I was captain of the tennis team.
mt: Nilikuwa kapteni wa timu ya tenisi.
ref: Nilikuwa nahodha wa timu ya tenisi.

src: Ben is the coach of the basketball team and he held try outs today.
mt: Ben ni meneja timu ya mpira wa kati na alikuwa ameleta uchaguzi leo.
ref: Ben ndiye mkufunzi wa timu ya mpira wa kikapu na alifanya mazoezi leo.

src: Officer Dunn didn't want to hurt anyone during the protest.
mt: Ofisa Dunn hakuwa na ahadi ya kuwaua mtu wakati wa kushirikiana katika kushitaki.
ref: Afisa Dunn hakutaka kumuumiza mtu yeyote wakati wa maandamano.

src: I noticed my hair was getting kind of long.
mt: Nilijua kwa kipindi kikubwa kichafu cha kichwa changu.
ref: Niligundua nywele zangu zilikuwa ndefu.

src: I drove my motorcycle across the street.
mt: Nilikuwa na motokaa na nimevamia barabara.
ref: Niliendesha pikipiki yangu upande ule mwingine wa barabara.

src: Ryan was called by his friend to skip work one day.
mt: Ryan alitupwa na mpenzi yake kwa kufuta kazi moja.
ref: Ryan alipigiwa simu na rafiki yake asiende kazi siku moja.

src: A man drove for many hours on the highway.
mt: Mtu alikuwa anavyoenda kwa muda mrefu kwenye barabara.
ref: Mwanaume fulani aliendesha gari kwa saa nyingi kwenye barabara kuu.

src: Josiah was a baby who was trying to crawl for the first time.
mt: Josiah alikuwa mtoto mdogo aliyekuwa anavyotembea kwa mara ya kwanza.
ref: Josiah alikuwa mtoto ambaye alikuwa anajaribu kutambaa kwa mara ya kwanza.

src: I wanted a pet for my birthday.
mt: Nilikuwa nataka kipenzi kwa siku ya kuzaliwa.
ref: Nilitaka mnyama kipenzi siku yangu ya kuzaliwa.

src: Sam wanted to be a singer.
mt: Sam alitaka kuwa mwanamuziki.
ref: Sam alitaka kuwa mwimbaji.

src: Growing up, Matt was never the most confident guy.
mt: Kutoka kwa kule, Matt alikuwa hakuwa mwanamume mwenye uwezo mkubwa.
ref: Akikua, Matt hakuwa mtu mwenye ujasiri kabisa.

src: Shyanne had a spelling test.
mt: Shyanne alifanya ujuzi wa herufi.
ref: Shyanne alikuwa na mtihani wa tahajia.

src: John wanted pizza, but he was broke.
mt: John alitaka pizza, lakini alikuwa na mapato.
ref: John alitaka pizza, lakini alikosa pesa.

src: Jill had to attend a dancing class around 8 P.M.
mt: Jill alishafurika kwa kikao cha kucheza kwa muda wa 8 P.M.
ref: Jill alilazimika kuhudhuria darasa la kudansi karibu saa 8 P.M.

src: We tried to stay up late last night.
mt: Tulikuwa tunavyoishi kwa siku ya jana.
ref: Tulijaribu kukesha jana usiku.

src: Ally had been saving her spare coins in a jar for Years.
mt: Ally alikuwa akisimamia fedha zake za kipindu kwa kikwao kwa miaka mingi.
ref: Ally alikuwa akihifadhi sarafu zake za ziada kwenye chupa kubwa kwa Miaka.

src: Mom asked me to go pick up some things at the grocery store.
mt: Mama alimwambia nikupe vitu vingi katika duka la bidhaa.
ref: Mama aliniomba niende nikanunue vitu kadhaa kwenye duka la vyakula.

src: In the car the whole family was excited.
mt: Katika gari wote familia waliwaza.
ref: Ndani ya gari, familia nzima alisisimka.

src: Ana had been putting off doing laundry.
mt: Ana alikuwa akifanya kazi za kujitahidi.
ref: Ana alikuwa akiahirisha kufua nguo.

src: Mark went to the mall.
mt: Mark alikuwa katika kongoni.
ref: Mark alienda kwenye jengo lenye maduka mengi.

src: My friends got me a jigsaw puzzle for christmas.
mt: Wanawake wangu wakapata nimejenga jengwa kwa siku ya Krismasi.
ref: Marafiki wangu waliniletea mchezo wa fumbo kwa ajili ya Krismasi.

src: Rex hasn't cleaned his room in Year's.
mt: Rex hajatengeneza chakula cha mwaka.
ref: Rex hajasafisha chumba chake kwa miaka mingi.

src: I was afraid of the exam tomorrow.
mt: Nilikuwa nafurahia kuhudhuria kipindi cha usajili.
ref: Niliogopa mtihani wa kesho.

src: My family was on vacation in Italy.
mt: Wanawake wangu walikuwa wakipumzika nchini Italia.
ref: Familia yangu ilikuwa likizo nchini Italia.

src: I woke up and looked in my closet for a shirt.
mt: Nilipokwama na kufika nimeangalia kwa muda katika kitanda cha kawaida.
ref: Niliamka na nikatafuta shati kwenye kabati langu.

src: JJ played all day long.
mt: JJ alitunza kila siku.
ref: JJ alicheza siku nzima.

src: The two hunters debated their location within the forest.
mt: Wawili wakijitafiti wakawazana mahali wao katika mazingira.
ref: Wawindaji wawili walijadili kuhusu eneo lao ndani ya msitu.

src: Todd has a huge test tomorrow.
mt: Todd ana test kubwa kesho.
ref: Todd ana mtihani mkubwa kesho.

src: Maggie needed a new friend.
mt: Maggie alihitaji mpenzi mpya.
ref: Maggie alihitaji rafiki mpya.

src: My roommate got a new job at the place I go to school.
mt: Kaka yangu alipata kazi mpya katika mahali ambako nimechuo.
ref: Mwenzi wangu wa kazi alipata kazi mpya mahali ninapoenda shule.

src: Brittany loved playing video games online.
mt: Brittany alivijua kucheza michezo ya video kwenye mitandao.
ref: Brittany alipenda kucheza michezo ya video mtandaoni.

src: Bobby had never been to a carnival before.
mt: Bobby alikuwa hajakwenda kwenye tamasha la kila mwaka kabla.
ref: Bobby alikuwa hajawahi kwenda kwenye kanivali awali.

src: I was listening to the radio today.
mt: Nilikuwa nimekikuta kwenye redio leo.
ref: Nilikuwa nikisikiliza redio leo.

src: Al and Val were very close twins.
mt: Al na Val walikuwa wanaume wawili wakubwa.
ref: Al na Val walikuwa mapacha wa karibu sana.

src: I've gotten three speeding tickets in my life.
mt: Nilikuwa na tatu kwa kufika kwa muda.
ref: Nimepata tikiti tatu za mwendo wa kasi katika maisha yangu.

src: David has always dreamed of visiting Oregon.
mt: David amekuwa anamshangaa kufika Oregon.
ref: Siku zote Davis ametamani kutembelea Oregon.

src: The high school student went to the dentist.
mt: Alumizi alifika daktari wa mdomo.
ref: Mwanafunzi huyo wa shule ya upili alienda kwa daktari wa meno.

src: Jayne visited Alden, New york.
mt: Jayne alitembelea Alden, New york.
ref: Jayne alitembelea Alden, New york.

src: Seth has worked at the air conditioning factory for six Year's.
mt: Seth amekuwa kazi katika faini ya kondisi ya hewa kwa miaka sita.
ref: Seth amefanya kazi kwenye kiwanda cha kusafisha hewa kwa muda wa miaka sita.

src: Amy was driving to school when her car stopped.
mt: Amy alikuwa anavyoenda shuleni wakati gari lake lilibakia.
ref: Amy alikuwa akiendesha shule gari lake liliposimama.

src: Rod smoked his entire life.
mt: Rod alikuwa anapiga bonge la kila siku.
ref: Rod alivuta sigara maisha yake yote.

src: Barry was excited that he finally registered to vote.
mt: Barry alikuwa na hamu kwamba akamaliza kufanya kazi ya kufanya kazi.
ref: Barry alisisimka kwamba mwishowe alijiandikisha kupiga kura.

src: Johnny was driving one day when he felt a strange bumpiness.
mt: Johnny alikuwa anavyoendesha siku moja wakati anapata kipinduzi kipindukazi.
ref: Johnny alikuwa akiendesha gari siku moja alipohisi mashimo yasiyo ya kawaida.

src: Amy wanted more space in her home.
mt: Amy alitaka nafasi zaidi katika nyumba yake.
ref: Amy alitaka nafasi zaidi nyumbani kwake.

src: My brothers and I were sharing a pizza.
mt: Wanawake wangu na mimi tulikuwa tukishirikiana pizza.
ref: Kaka wangu na mimi tulikuwa tukishiriki pizza.

src: May was a shelter cat the pet store took in for adoption day.
mt: May alikuwa kiti cha mazingira pet store alikata kwa ajili ya kuuza siku.
ref: May alikuwa paka wa makao ambaye alichukuliwa na duka la wanyama kwa siku ya ulezi.

src: Monica was an eight year old girl who loved to knit scarves.
mt: Monica alikuwa mtoto wa miaka kumi na mbili anayemshika kifua.
ref: Monica alikuwa msichana mwenye umri wa miaka minane aliyependa kushona skafu.

src: The suspect saw that the cell door was unlocked.
mt: Usaiti aliona kwamba kifungo cha seli kilikuwa sikivu.
ref: Mshukiwa aliona kwamba mlango wa seli ulikuwa umefunguliwa.

src: A girl falls in love with a boy and he liked her too.
mt: Kijana anapenda kijana na kijana anapenda pia.
ref: Msichana alimpenda mvulana na yeye alimpenda pia.

src: One day, the president of the United States visited my hometown.
mt: Moja siku, rais wa Marekani alivisit my home town.
ref: Siku moja, rais wa Marekani alitembelea mji wangu wa nyumbani.

src: Jake's dad took him to his first football game.
mt: Baba ya Jake alimwamini kwanza kucheza mpira.
ref: Baba ya Jake alimpeleka kwenye mchezo wake wa kwanza wa mpira wa mguu.

src: I wanted to do something fun.
mt: Nilikuwa nataka kufanya kitu kizuri.
ref: Nilitaka kufanya kitu kinachofurahisha.

src: Amy was unsatisfied with her paper.
mt: Amy alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu kitabu chake.
ref: Amy hakuridhishwa na kazi yake.

src: Steve was an accomplished carpenter.
mt: Steve alikuwa mchungaji mzuri.
ref: Steve alikuwa seremala aliyebobea.

src: I don't believe in luck.
mt: Sijui na mafanikio.
ref: Siamini bahati.

src: Jon felt like a bad dad.
mt: Jon alikuwa na wasiwasi kama baba mchafu.
ref: John alihisi kuwa yeye ni baba mbaya.

src: Ben walked along the street and found the end of a length of string.
mt: Ben alipokuwa akifika barabarini, alipata mwisho wa upeo wa kitufe.
ref: Ben alikuwa akitembea mtaani na akapata mwisho wa kamba ndefu.

src: Juan wanted to be a luchador.
mt: Juan alitaka kuwa mshambuliaji wa ndege.
ref: Juan alitaka kuwa mpiganaji mieleka.

src: On Sunday, Tori found out she was pregnant!
mt: Jumamosi, Tori alijua kwamba alikuwa na ujauzito!
ref: Mnamo Jumapili, Tori aligundua alikuwa mjamzito!

src: Sara works next door to a bakery.
mt: Sara anafanya kazi karibu na choma cha kule.
ref: Sara anafanya kazi kando ya duka la mikate.

src: Rufus has just enrolled in a new school and he has no friends there.
mt: Rufus amejiunga na shule mpya na hana rafiki zake hapo.
ref: Rufus amejiandikisha katika shule mpya na hana marafiki hapo.

src: Tom wanted a Chemistry set for Christmas.
mt: Tom alitaka seti ya kemia kwa siku ya Krismasi.
ref: Tom alitaka seti ya Kemia kwa ajili ya Krisimasi.

src: Early every morning the hummingbirds visit my porch.
mt: Kila mchana muingi wanaoziarisha ndani ya nyumba yangu.
ref: Kila mapema asubuhi ndege wavumaji hetembelea veranda yangu.

src: Io was appearing in a school play.
mt: Io alikuwa anashiriki katika tamasha la shule.
ref: Io alikuwa akishiriki katika mchezo wa kuigiza wa shule.

src: I was at my first day of work.
mt: Nilikuwa katika siku yangu ya kwanza kazi.
ref: Nilikuwa katika siku yangu ya kwanza kazini.

src: Tyler went to a baseball game.
mt: Tyler alifika kwenye mchezo wa kikapu.
ref: Tyler alienda kwenye mchezo wa besiboli.

src: Flora's tooth started to hurt.
mt: Zizi la Flora kuanza kuwa na nguvu.
ref: Jino la Flora lilianza kuuma.

src: Derek likes to read.
mt: Derek anapenda kusoma.
ref: Derek anapenda kusoma.

src: I went to a bar with some friends of mine.
mt: Nilikuja kwa bar kwa wenzangu.
ref: Nilienda kwenye baa na baadhi ya marafiki wangu.

src: I was at the laundromat last Sunday.
mt: Nilikuwa katika kituo cha kuwasha kwa siku ya jumamosi.
ref: Nilikuwa mahali pa kufulia nguo Jumapili iliyopita.

src: Pat woke up with the urge to play hooky from work.
mt: Pat alipokwama na hamu ya kufanya kazi ya kawaida.
ref: Pat aliamka na tamaa ya kucheza hooky kutoka kazini.

src: Greg was riding his bike to the store.
mt: Greg alikuwa akimwaga ndege yake hadi duka.
ref: Greg alikuwa akiendesha baisikeli yake akienda dukani.

src: Johnson has never liked being outdoors very much.
mt: Johnson hana nafasi ya kuwa nje sana.
ref: Johnson hajawahi penda kuwa nje sana.

src: Jim lost his wallet that had all of his money it.
mt: Jim alipoteza kambi yake ambayo ilikuwa na wote wao waliopatikana.
ref: Jim alipoteza pochi lake ambalo lilikuwa na pesa zake.

src: Sally had an older sister who was good at everything.
mt: Sally alikuwa na dada yake mmoja aliye na uwezo wa kila kitu.
ref: Sally alikuwa na dada mkubwa ambaye alikuwa mzuri kwa kila kitu.

src: I had to take my son to the emergency room this summer.
mt: Nilikataa kumuzaa mtoto wangu katika baraza la matibabu hii maji.
ref: Nililazimika kumpeleka mtoto wangu wa kiume kwa chumba cha dharura majira haya ya joto.

src: Little Lorelei is eight months old and teething.
mt: Lorelei ni mmoja wa watoto wanne wanaoishi katika mji wa Mombasa, Kenya. Amezaliwa tarehe 12 Januari 2008 na amekuwa na kipindupindu kwa miezi sita.
ref: Lorelei mdogo alikuwa na umri wa miezi minane na alikuwa akiota meno.

src: I was at the park the other day.
mt: Nilikuwa katika parki jana.
ref: Nilikuwa kwenye bustani siku moja.

src: Graham wanted to get a selfie stick.
mt: Graham alitaka kupata kitu cha kupiga selfie.
ref: Graham alitaka kupata kijiti cha selfi.

src: Lewis knew the cave like the back of his hand.
mt: Lewis alijua kifaru kama nyuma yake.
ref: Lewis alifahamu pango vizuri sana.

src: Sean and Sara were going to buy a guitar.
mt: Sean na Sara walikuwa wakifurahia kupata gitaa.
ref: Sean na Sara walikuwa wakienda kununua gita.

src: Chris was not looking forward to going to school on Friday.
mt: Chris alikuwa hata hapa akisikitika kufika shule Jumatano.
ref: Chris hakuwa akitamani kwenda shuleni Ijumaa.

src: Martha was a terrible cook and her boyfriend knew it.
mt: Martha alikuwa mchakachuaji mkali na mpenzi wake alijua.
ref: Martha alikuwa mpishi mbaya na mpenzi wake alijua hivyo.

src: There was a stray cat who loved my cat.
mt: Kuna kiti kama kiti aliyemwita kiti changu.
ref: Kulikuwa na paka wa kutangatanga aliyempenda paka wangu.

src: An office downtown had a red carpet.
mt: Ofisi moja katika mji mkuu ilikuwa na kifani kikirahishe.
ref: Ofisi ya mjini ilikuwa na zulia nyekundu.

src: Lexi wanted to be healthy.
mt: Lexi alitaka kuwa na afya.
ref: Lexi alitaka kuwa mwenye afya.

src: Anna wanted chicken wings.
mt: Anna alitaka mabichi ya kuku.
ref: Anna alitaka kula mabawa ya kuku.

src: My brother kept fighting me for the remote last week.
mt: Jamaa yangu alikuwa anashindana nami kwa kipande cha kipinduzi wiki iliyopita.
ref: Ndugu yangu aliendelea kupigana na mimi kwa ajili ya rimoti wiki iliyopita.

src: Ivy was flying in a small sightseeing plane.
mt: Ivy alikuwa akifanya ndege ya kujifunza.
ref: Ivy alikuwa akisafiri katika ndege ndogo ya kuangalia mandhari.

src: Joey was a second grader that like to color in coloring books.
mt: Joey alikuwa mwanafunzi wa kwanza anayemudu kwa vitabu vya kujifunza rangi.
ref: Joey alikuwa mwanafunzi wa gredi ya pili ambaye alipenda kupaka rangi katika vitabu vya kupaka rangi.

src: John had a huge client presentation tomorrow, but he felt unprepared.
mt: John alikuwa na mafunzo makubwa ya kila mmoja kwa mtekelezaji kesho, lakini alikuwa bila ujuzi.
ref: John alikuwa na onyesho kubwa la kumwonyesha mteja kesho, lakini alihisi hakuwa tayari.

src: Fred decided to play the lottery.
mt: Fred aliamua kucheza mafuta.
ref: Fred aliamua kucheza bahati nasibu.

src: Gina was using a restroom at a gas station.
mt: Gina alikuwa akifanya kazi katika tofauti ya benki.
ref: Gina alikuwa akitumia choo katika kituo cha mafuta.

src: When it was time to eat, Mother rang the bell.
mt: Kama ilivyokuwa wakati wa chakula, Mama aliruka ngoma.
ref: Ilipofika wakati wa kula, Mama alipiga kengele.

src: Emmy's dad took her to chose a kitten.
mt: Baba wa Emmy alimwambia kuchagua kiti.
ref: Baba ya Emmy alimpeleka kununua mtoto wa paka.

src: Jill went to college.
mt: Jill alipata chuo.
ref: Jill alienda chuo cha elimu.

src: Jerry had always wanted to learn how to play guitar.
mt: Jerry alikuwa anataka kujifunza kucheza gitaa.
ref: Jerry amekuwa akitaka sana kujifunza jinsi ya kucheza gita.

src: Kyle collected many things.
mt: Kyle alikusanya mengi.
ref: Kyle alikusanya vitu vingi.

ref: Francine aligundua kuwa marafiki wake wote walivaa viatu virefu.

src: When I was young I loved hide and sneak.
mt: Nilikuwa mchanga nilipenda kuchukua na kuchukua.
ref: Nilipokuwa mchanga nilipenda mchezo wa kujificha na kutafutana.

src: Rachel was looking at her daily mail.
mt: Rachel alikuwa anavyofurahia barua yake ya kila siku.
ref: Rachel alikuwa akiangalia barua yake ya kila siku.

src: Deb got fired from her job due to cutbacks.
mt: Deb alitolewa kazi kwa sababu ya kupungua kwa ajira.
ref: Deb alifukuzwa kazi kwa sababu ya mapunguzo ya gharama.

src: Bethany was self-conscious about her arm hair.
mt: Bethany alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu nywele zake za kichwa.
ref: Bethany alikuwa na wasiwasi wa nywele zake za mkono.

src: Gina's parents were driving to Illinois.
mt: Wazazi wa Gina walikuwa wakivamia Illinois.
ref: Wazazi wa Gina walikuwa wakiendesha gari kwenda Illinois.

src: One summer my sister and I set up a lemonade stand.
mt: Kwa majuma mmoja, dada yangu na mimi tumekuza kwa kuchukua chakula cha limau.
ref: Majira moja ya joto, mimi na dada yangu tuliweka stendi ya maji ya limau.

src: Bob moved from a small town to a large city.
mt: Bob alivamiwa kutoka mji mdogo hadi mji mkubwa.
ref: Bob alihama kutoka mji mdogo kwenda mji mkubwa.

src: Kelly was reading about hybrid animals online.
mt: Kelly alikuwa akirejea kuhusu wanyama wanaoendana kwa mtandao.
ref: Kelly alikuwa akisoma kuhusu wanyama chotara mtandaoni.

src: Jorie went with her family to visit Anne Frank's home in Amsterdam.
mt: Jorie alifika na familia yake kwa kuzitupa Anne Frank's home in Amsterdam.
ref: Jorie alikwenda pamoja na familia yake kutembelea nyumbani kwa Anne Frank huko Amsterdam.

src: Clara went home from work one day.
mt: Clara alipata nyumbani kutoka kazi siku moja.

mt: Tim alitaka kila wakati kucheza madrums.
ref: Tim amekuwa akitaka kucheza ngoma.

src: I love all you can eat buffets.
mt: Ninapenda vyote vya kula kwa kila mtu.
ref: Ninapenda bafe za kukula kadri uwezavyo.

src: Kenny was playing at the park.
mt: Kenny alikuwa akicheza katika parki.
ref: Kenny alikuwa akicheza kwenye bustani.

src: Mag had a night with no kids or husband.
mt: Mag alikuwa na usiku bila watoto au mke.
ref: Mag alikuwa na usiku asiokuwa na watoto au mume wake.

src: Lilly made cranberry sauce for Thanksgiving.
mt: Lilly alifanya kungu kwa siku ya kupenda.
ref: Lilly alitengeneza sosi ya kranberi siku ya Kutoa shukrani.

src: Both my kids came home from college in Dec.
mt: Watu wangu wawili wakijifungua kwa kuhudhuria chuo kikuu wakati wa Desemba.
ref: Watoto wangu wawili walikuja nyumbani kutoka chuoni Desemba.

src: Michael saw a squirrel living in the dumpster one day.
mt: Michael aliona kipenzi kipenzi akiishi katika kambi moja siku moja.
ref: Michael aliona kindi akiishi katika pipa siku moja.

src: Rob like salsa.
mt: Rob like salsa.
ref: Rob anapenda salsa.

src: Jennifer dove from the starting block.
mt: Jennifer alivuta kutoka kwa kifua cha kwanza.

mt: Ace alikuwa anacheza poker na wenzake.

mt: Wazazi wa Ted walimwambia awezeshi kufanya masomo na si kucheza.
ref: Wazazi wa Ted walimwambia azingatie masomo yake na sio michezo.

mt: Baada ya kutoa watoto wake shuleni, Tammy alidhania damu.

mt: Jay alipokwama asubuhi, alisikia saa yake ya gari.
ref: Jay aliamshwa asubuhi na sauti ya kingora cha gari lake.

mt: Bob alipita kwenye duka la kubadilishia kwa ajili ya kujua taratibu.
ref: Bob alienda kwenye duka la bidhaa zilizotumiwa kutafuta dili.

mt: Rover alikuwa na nafasi ya kucheza na mwenyezi.
ref: Rover alipenda kucheza mchezo wa kuchukua mpira unaorushwa na mwenyewe.

mt: Mama yangu alikuwa akifika kwenye barabara ya reli.

mt: Alan alitaka kujaribu kasi yake ya kupika.

src: Connie was invited to a party.
mt: Connie alitambuliwa kwa sherehe.

src: I bought a car a few months ago.
mt: Nilimaliza gari kwa muda mfupi.

mt: Trent na familia yake wakati wa safari ya barabara.

mt: Mei ilikuwa mwezi wake wa kwanza.
ref: Mei ulikuwa mwezi unaopendwa sana na Harry.

mt: Gina alipata kwa saa ya 6 kwa kazi yake.
ref: Gina alienda kwa darasa lake la mwisho.

mt: Nilizidi kuchimba mchanga kabla ya kuanguka kwenye macho ya kawaida.
ref: Nilitaka nyasi zikatwe kabla ya giza kuingia nje.

mt: Jioni ya mvua Susan alipanga katika barabara kwa ajili ya kupumzika.
ref: Jioni moja kukiwa na mvua Susan aliegesha gari katiku kituo cha kupumzika kwenye barabara ili kupumzika.

src: I was going for a ride with my grandparents.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechukua safari na wazee wangu.
ref: Nilikuwa ninaenda safari na wazazi wangu wakuu.

mt: Kila mwaka Brad na Ashley wanapiga kwa maji ya mto.
ref: Kila majira ya joto Brad na Ashley huenda kuogelea mtoni.

mt: Sam alingia ndege yake ya barua na kufika.
ref: Sam aliingia kwenye gari lake la barua na kuondoka.

src: John liked a girl at his work.
mt: John alikuwa anavyopenda dada katika kazi yake.
ref: John alimpenda msichana kazini mwake.

src: Aurelia was given an ice cream maker for her birthday.
mt: Aurelia alipewa mchakato wa kula kwa kivuli kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa.
ref: Aurelia alipewa kitengeneza aisikrimu kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa.

src: Miriam was constantly arguing about everything.
mt: Miriam alikuwa anasimama kwa kila kitu.
ref: Miriam hubishana kila wakati kuhusu kila kitu.

src: Gina and her friends had been given permission to go to the library.
mt: Gina na wenzake walikuwa wamepewa ruhusa ya kujia ndani kwa chumba cha vitabu.
ref: Gina na marafiki wake walikuwa wamepewa ruhusu ya kwenda kwenye maktaba.

src: My class and I went for a field trip.
mt: Kila mwaka, wale wote wanaoendesha kwa kipindi cha miaka mitatu wanapewa nafasi ya kufanya safari ya kijiji.
ref: Darasa langu na mimi tulienda kwa safari ya kimasomo.

src: I went to get burgers for my family last week.
mt: Nilikuja kupata nyama choma kwa familia yangu wiki iliyopita.
ref: Nilienda kupata hambaga kwa ajili ya familia yangu wiki iliyopita.

src: Alice had a presentation at 9 am at work on Monday.
mt: Aliyejulikana kama Alice alikuwa na kipindi cha kushirikiana jioni jumamosi.
ref: Alice ana maonyesho saa 9 am kazini mnamo Jumatatu.

src: Gina had taken her crying brothers ice cream.
mt: Gina alimwachia wana wake wawili wanaokimbia chakula cha kisukari.
ref: Gina alikuwa amechukua aiskrimu ya ndugu zake wanaolia.

src: Amber really enjoyed playing softball.
mt: Amber alivyocheza mpira wa kidonda.
ref: Amber alifurahia sana kucheza softiboli.

src: Gina and her family arrived at her grandma's house.
mt: Gina na familia yake wakaruka kwa baba yake.
ref: Gina na familia yake waliwasili katika nyumba ya bibi yake.

src: On Christmas morning, I woke up at 5 AM like when I was a child.
mt: Jana jioni, nilipokwenda kwa nyumbani, nilipata nafasi ya kuwakuta kama wakati nilivyokuwa mtoto.
ref: Asubuhi ya kuamkia Krisimasi, niliamka saa 5 AM kama nilivyokuwa nikiwa mtoto.

src: Jim tried out for the basketball team and was cut at try outs.
mt: Jim alitafuta kwa timu ya mpira wa kati na alitupwa kwa kujitolea.
ref: Jim alijaribu kujiunga na timu ya mpira wa kikapu na akakatatiliwa wakati wa majaribio.

src: Mary had a credit card debt of over $2000.
mt: Mary alikuwa na dhamana ya kadi ya kifedha ya zaidi ya $2000.
ref: Mary alikuwa na deni la kadi ya mkopo la zaidi ya $2000.

src: John had worked hard on his homework but couldn't find it anywhere.
mt: John alifanya kazi kubwa juu ya kazi yake ya nyumbani lakini hakutambua hata kwa nini.
ref: John alifanya kazi yake ya nyumbani kwa bidii lakini haikupata mahali popote.

src: Tommy and Billy started a lemonade stand.
mt: Tommy na Billy wakamilisha kazi ya kuuza maji ya limau.
ref: Tommy na Billy walianzisha kibanda cha maji ya limau.

src: Tori was so excited to go trick or treating.
mt: Toriko alikuwa na hamu kubwa ya kufika kwenye kipindi cha kufanya kazi za kufanya kazi.
ref: Tori alisisimka kwenda kwa vitisho vya kupate peremende.

src: Beverly was ready for a change.
mt: Beverly alikuwa tayari kwa mabadiliko.
ref: Bevery alikuwa tayari kwa mabadiliko.

src: John felt like he was coming down with a cold.
mt: John alikuwa akimwona kuwa amekuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: John alihisi ni kama anapata mafua.

src: Sally like pizza night on fridays.
mt: Sally anapenda usiku wa pizza jumatano.
ref: Sally anapenda usiku wa piza wa ijumaa.

src: School was just a disaster today.
mt: Shule ilikuwa kama ajabu leo.
ref: Shule ilikuwa mbaya tu leo.

src: Felipe has always wanted to see the beautiful Pacific Northwest.
mt: Felipe alikuwa anataka kuona mazingira ya magharibi ya Pasifiki.
ref: Felipe amekuwa akitaka kuona Kaskazini-magharibi ya Pasifiki.

src: Ed challenged his brother to a basketball game.
mt: Ed alitofautisha ndugu yake kwa mchezo wa kandanda.
ref: Ed alimwalika ndugu yake kushindana mchezo wa mpira wa kikapu.

src: Lary was a poor coal miner.
mt: Lary alikuwa mchiga madini mwenye mapato ya chini.
ref: Lary alikuwa mchimba-migodi masikini.

src: Jim's car was ten Year's old, and started having problems.
mt: Gari la Jim lilikuwa na umri wa miaka kumi, na kuanza kujitokeza kwa masuala.
ref: Gari la Jim lilikuwa la miaka kumi, na lilianza kuwa na matatizo.

src: Nick took his dog for a walk last Saturday.
mt: Nick alitupa mbwa yake kwa kuchukua barabara jumamosi.
ref: Nick alipeleka mbwa wake kutembea Jumamosi iliyopita.

src: Earl is a grandfather for the first time today!
mt: Earl ni babu kwa mara ya kwanza leo!
ref: Earl ni babu kwa mara ya kwanza leo!

src: The building exploded.
mt: Barabara ilipuka.
ref: Jengo lililipuka.

src: My girlfriend collects stamps.
mt: Rafiki yangu anazitaka timu.
ref: Mpenzi wangu hukusanya stampu.

src: Jake opened his fridge, looking for food.
mt: Jake alitoka kwa kibali, kwa kutafuta chakula.
ref: Jake alifungua friji yake, akitafuta chakula.

src: Elda had a craving for french fries.
mt: Elda alikuwa na hamu ya kula chipsi za Ufaransa.
ref: Elda alikuwa akitamani chipsi.

src: One year, Matt was training for a half marathon.
mt: Kwa mwaka mmoja, Matt alikuwa akifundisha kwa kipindi cha nusu mara.
ref: Kwa mwaka mmoja, Matt alikuwa akifanya mazoezi ya nusu mbio za nyika.

src: Susie loves her grandma's banana bread.
mt: Susie anapenda kwa kipande kipande kwa mkate wa kibande cha bibi yake.
ref: Susie anapenda mkate wa ndizi wa bibi yake.

src: Jon and Mika wanted a baby daughter.
mt: Jon na Mika walitaka mtoto mwanamke.
ref: Jon na Mika walitaka mtoto msichana.

src: Brendon used to work with mike.
mt: Brendon alikuwa anafanya kazi na mike.
ref: Brendon alikuwa akifanya kazi na mike.

src: Cara was tired of the clutter which had piled up in her garage.
mt: Cara alikuwa na shida kubwa kwa kujitupa kwa kila kitu kilichopakana katika gari lake.
ref: Cara alikuwa amechoshwa na mrundiko uliokuwa umerundika katika gereji yake.

src: I remember the scariest haunted house I've ever been to.
mt: Nilikuwa na kumbukumbu ya nyumba ya wanyama wakati mwingine.
ref: Ninakumbuka nyumba iliyokuwa ikitisha zaidi ambayo nimewahi kuwa.

mt: Lorraine alikuwa na ahadi ya kufanya magunia kama yale yaliyotengenezwa na mama yake.
ref: Lorraine amekuwa akitaka kutengeze biskuti kama mama yake.

src: Lucy loved writing poems.
mt: Lucy alivipenda kuandika shairi.
ref: Lucy anapenda kuandika mashairi.

src: Joe was having his family over for the Thanksgiving holiday.
mt: Joe alikuwa akifurahia familia yake kwa siku ya kushukuru.
ref: Joe alikuwa atembelewe na familia yake wakati wa likizo ya Kutoa shukrani.

src: Jake wanted to make a YouTube account.
mt: Jake alitaka kujenga akaunti ya YouTube.

ref: Jackie alikuwa akiendesha kwenda kazini kwenye barabara kuu.

mt: Kelly na wenzake wakatarajia kufika India kwa chakula cha chaj.
ref: Kelly na marafiki wake waliamua kwenda kwenye mkahawa wa Kihindi kwa chakua cha mchana.

mt: Levi alikuwa na hamu kubwa kufanya mabakuli na mama yake.
ref: Levi alisisimka sana kuhusu kutengeneza mishumaa na mama yake.

src: I went to buy a new television last week.
mt: Nilikuja kupata televisheni mpya wiki iliyopita.

mt: Dennis alifika katika mashindano ya kusafirisha.
ref: Dennis iliingia mashindano ya kuteleza mawimbini.

mt: Ben's kijiji hakikuwa rahisi, kwa sababu vitu vilivyoanza kuzaliwa, lakini bila kujivua.
ref: Bustani ya Ben haikuwa nzuri sana, kwa sababu vitu vilimea, lakini si vizuri.

src: Joe was really hungry.
mt: Joe alikuwa na ugonjwa wa njaa.
ref: Joe alikuwa na njaa sana.

src: Jason and his friends were gathering to watch a movie.
mt: Jason na wenzake wakikusanya kwa ajili ya kuangalia filamu.
ref: Jason na marafiki wake walikusanyika kutazama filamu.

mt: Mary alitaka kufanya mpango kwa siku ya mwaka mpya.
ref: Mary alitaka kufanya mipango ya Mkesha wa Mwaka Mpya.

src: Jim went to the wetlands with a giant gun.

mt: Jody alikuwa mchafu mzito.

src: Charlie would eat anything.
mt: Charlie anajivunia yote.

src: Nora wanted to go on vacation.
mt: Nora alitaka kufika kwenye kanda.

src: Neil knew what he had to do on his visit to Dublin.
mt: Neil alijua nini alitakiwa kufanya katika ziara yake Dublin.

ref: Francisco anawaonea wivu marafiki wake wote walioenda kuteleza barafuni majira haya ya baridi.

mt: Joey alifanya kazi kwa kampuni kubwa lakini saa zake zilibadiliwa.
ref: Joey alifanya kazi katika kampuni kubwa lakini saa zake zilipunguzwa.

src: Joe lived a lonely life.
mt: Joe alikuwa na maisha yake yaliyopambana.

mt: Amy alikuwa na ugonjwa wa hali ya juu kila wakati.
ref: Amy alikuwa na mafadhaiko sana kila wakati.

mt: Nya alikuwa anavya chakula kisichokosea na kushika uzito wake.
ref: Nya alijaribu kula lishe ya afya na kudhibiti uzito wake.

src: My roommate was sick.
mt: Kaka yangu alikuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: Mkazi mwenza wangu alikuwa mgonwja.

mt: Ted na wenzake walipata mabonde kwa kufika katika mazingira.
ref: Ted na marafiki wake walienda kwenye bustani kupanda mlima.

mt: Kwa kawaida ni salama na nyororo asubuhi, Florida.
ref: Kawaida kuna utulivu na joto asubuhi, huko Florida.

src: I've been on an art kick lately.
mt: Nilikuwa nimekuwa kwenye kipindi cha sanaa kwa sasa.
ref: Nimekuwa kwenye sanaa siku hizi.

mt: Lisa kuanza kuona kwamba hana nafasi ya kujifunza biashara.
ref: Lisa alianza kugundua kuwa hakufurahiya kusoma somo la biashara.

mt: Mary alitaka kufika kwenye sinema ya kwanza.
