ref: Maureen amekuwa akitaka kuwa mwalimu wa Biolojia.

src: Cornelia had always loved working with her hands.
mt: Cornelia alikuwa anapenda kufanya kazi zake kwa mikono.
ref: Cornelia amekuwa akipenda kufanya kazi kwa kutumia mikono yake.

src: The kids went to the graveyard.
mt: Watu wachanga walipita kwenye kaburi.
ref: Watoto walienda makaburi.

src: Bo and Jim wanted to drive fast.
mt: Bo na Jim walitaka kufanya ndege kwa haraka.
ref: Bo na Jim walitaka kuendesha kwa kasi.

src: Today Sally went for a hike.
mt: Leo Sally alipita kwa kipindi.
ref: Leo Sally alienda kutembea.

src: Joy's boyfriend took her to play putt putt.
mt: Kaka wa Joy alimwambea kucheza putt putt.
ref: Mpenzi wa Joy alimpeleka kucheza putt putt.

src: My nephew is a professional chef.
mt: Jamaa yangu ni mchungaji wa kazi.
ref: Mpwa wangu ni mpishi mtaalamu.

src: The little sister found out she was having a baby brother.
mt: Jike mweupe alijua kwamba alikuwa na mwana mchungu.
ref: Dada mdogo aligundua atakuwa na ndugu mchanga.

src: I went on a hiking trip this summer.
mt: Nilipiga kwa kipindi cha barabara hii katika kipindi cha joto.
ref: Nilienda safari ya kutembea majira haya ya joto.

src: Hailey was participating in her school marathon.
mt: Hailey alikuwa anashiriki maratoni ya shule yake.
ref: Hailey alikuwa akishiriki katika mbio za masafa marefu shuleni mwake.

src: Jim was mowing the yard when his mower got stuck on some metal.
mt: Jim alikuwa akimkamata mchakacho wakati mchakacho ulipata kama kwa nyongo.
ref: Jim alikuwa akikata nyasi wakati mashine yake ya kukata nyasi ilikwama kwenye chuma fulani.

src: Kyle and Ted were in a pie eating contest.
mt: Kyle na Ted walikuwa katika mashindano ya kupika tunda.
ref: Kyle na Ted walikuwa katika shindano la kula pai.

src: Bob was playing volleyball.
mt: Bob alikuwa anacheza mpira wa vikundi.
ref: Bob alikuwa akicheza voliboli.

src: Kathy realized to her horror that she was out of milk.
mt: Kathy alijua kwa ajabu kwamba alikuwa bila maziwa.
ref: Kathy aligundua kwamba alikuwa ameishiwa na maziwa.

src: Chuck always wanted to join the debate team at school.
mt: Chuck alikuwa na ahadi ya kujiunga na timu ya mawasiliano ya kuharakisha katika shule.
ref: Chuck amekuwa akitaka kujiunga na timu ya mjadala shuleni.

src: I once got lost in the woods.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepoteza njia katika mashamba.
ref: Kuna wakati nilipotea msituni.

src: Laura had a passion for art.
mt: Laura alikuwa na uongozi wa sanaa.
ref: Laura alikuwa na shauku ya sanaa.

src: Jason had always admired the fast movements of boxers he saw on TV.
mt: Jason alikuwa anavyozingatia haraka za waboksi aliyoelewa kwenye TV.
ref: Jason amekuwa akitamani mienendo ya kasi ya wanadondia aliyoiona kwenye TV.

src: Our kids had a 2 day break from school.
mt: Watu wetu wanaozaa waliweza kupata nafasi ya kujifungua kwa siku mbili kutoka shule.
ref: Watoto wetu walikuwa na mapumziko ya siku 2 kutoka shuleni.

src: Tom was at the bus stop on a weekend.
mt: Tom alikuwa kwenye kambi ya basi kwenye wiki ya jumamosi.
ref: Tom alikuwa katika kituo cha basi wikendi.

src: Allie lost 50 pounds.
mt: Allie alipoteza 50 kilo.
ref: Allie alipoteza pauni 50.

src: Jenny was addicted to sending text messages.
mt: Jenny alikuwa na ugonjwa wa kutumia mawasilisho ya kifonolojia.
ref: Jenny alikuwa na uraibu wa kutuma ujumbe mfupi.

src: Elle wanted a new car.
mt: Elle alitaka gari mpya.
ref: Elle alitaka gari jipya.

src: Jay was having car trouble.
mt: Jay alikuwa na matatizo ya gari.
ref: Jay alikuwa na matizo ya gari.

src: Ned was hiking in the woods when he saw a  lump of fur under a tree.
mt: Ned alikuwa akifika katika maeneo ya mawimbi wakati akawaona kitu kikuu cha nywele chini ya mti.
ref: Ned alikuwa akitembea msituni alipoona donge la manyoya chini ya mti.

src: Don's friend pulled Don's pants down in front of his graduating class.
mt: Don's mpenzi alitupilia Don's pantoni chini kabla ya kufanya kazi yake ya kujifungua.
ref: Rafiki ya Don alivuta chini suruali ya Don mbele ya darasa lake la kuhitimu.

src: One day I went outside and my dog was not there.
mt: Moja siku nilipofika nje, mbwa wangu hakika.
ref: Siku moja nilitoka nje na mbwa wangu hakuwapo.

src: I met my husband to be at Costco.
mt: Nilipata mpenzi wangu kwa sasa katika Costco.
ref: Nilikutana na mume wangu kuwa huko Costco.

src: Cindy was at a restaurant.
mt: Cindy alikuwa katika restoranti.
ref: Cindy alikuwa kwenye mgahawa.

src: Laura has always loves swimming, but she has never tried backstroke.
mt: Laura alikuwa anapenda kulaani, lakini hanae kupiga kwa kawaida.
ref: Laura amekuwa akipenda kuogelea, lakini hajawahi kujaribu kuogelea kinyumenyume.

src: One day I decided I wanted to walk into town.
mt: Moja siku nilisema nataka nikuwale kwa mji.
ref: Siku moja niliamua nataka kutembea mjini.

src: Jess hated egg salad.
mt: Jess alikuwa na hasira kwa saladi ya mayai.
ref: Jess alichukia saladi ya yai.

src: Robbie and I went to a fancy restaurant for our anniversary.
mt: Robi na mimi tulipiga ndege kwa chakula cha kisasa kwa siku ya mwaka wetu.
ref: Mimi na Robbie tulienda kwenye mkahawa mzuri kwa ajili ya maadhimisho ya miaka yetu.

src: Lonnie was fed up with modern life.
mt: Lonnie alikuwa na shida na maisha ya sasa.
ref: Lonnie alikuwa amechoshwa na maisha ya kisasa.

src: Bob had to get to work in the morning.
mt: Bob alitaka kufika kazi jioni.
ref: Bob alilazimika kufika kazini asubuhi.

src: Ava needed a plane ticket across the country.
mt: Ava alihitaji tiketi ya ndege kwa nchi nzima.
ref: Ava alihitaji tikiti ya ndege ya kwenda ngambo ya nchi.

src: My friend Sharon was nervous yesterday.
mt: Sharon yangu alikuwa na wasiwasi jana.
ref: Rafiki yangu Sharon alikuwa na wasiwasi jana.

src: Nita was playing rummy with her dad.
mt: Nita alikuwa anacheza rummy na baba yake.
ref: Nita alikuwa akicheza rummy na baba yake.

src: Tina was having her first skating competition.
mt: Tina alikuwa na mashindano yake ya kwanza ya mabingwa.
ref: Tina alikuwa na mashindano yake ya kwanza ya kuteleza barafuni.

src: Neil took a tour to the taj Mahal.
mt: Neil alifanya safari kwa taj Mahal.
ref: Neil alienda ziara kwa taj Mahal.

src: Mark and Frank were swimming in Mark's family's pool.
mt: Mark na Frank walikuwa wakipiga kwa maji katika bili ya familia ya Mark.
ref: Mark na Frank walikuwa wakiogelea kwenye dimbwi la familia ya Mark.

src: Ty was nervous about attending summer camp not knowing anyone.
mt: Ty alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhudhuria kampuni ya kuchimba kwa sababu hakujua mtu yeyote.
ref: Ty alikuwa na wasiwasi wa kuhudhuria kambi ya majira ya joto bila kujua mtu yeyote.

src: Vince was craving something sweet.
mt: Vince alikuwa akimwaga mafuta ya kibichi.
ref: Vince alikuwa akitamani kitu kitamu.

src: Ned wanted to learn to play basketball.
mt: Ned alitaka kujifunza kucheza mpira wa kike.
ref: Ned alitaka kujifunza kucheza mpira wa kikapu.

src: Buck had lost his house and job.
mt: Buck alikuwa ameipoteza nyumba na kazi.
ref: Buck alikuwa amepoteza nyumba na kazi yake.

src: Josh liked bees.
mt: Josh alikuwa na uangalifu kwa wadudu.
ref: Josh alipenda nyuki.

src: Last week my girlfriend and I bought three lottery tickets.
mt: Jana wiki, mpenzi wangu na mimi tumalipia tiketi tatu za kubadilishana.
ref: Wiki iliyopita mimi na mpenzi tulinunua tikiti tatu za bahati nasibu.

src: Fred always stopped at the same coffee shop before work.
mt: Fred alikuwa anapita katika kikao cha kahawa kabla ya kazi.
ref: Kila wakati Fred alisimama kwenye duka moja la kahawa kabla ya kazi.

src: Jenny was at the store hungry one day.
mt: Jenny alikuwa katika duka mmoja na hunge mmoja.
ref: Siku moja Jenny alikuwa dukani akiwa na njaa.

src: Bob knocked on the door and asked for Jenny.
mt: Bob alitupia kwa panga na kusema kwa Jenny.
ref: Bob aligonga mlango na kuulizia Jenny.

src: I got a new truck.
mt: Nilipata gari mpya.
ref: Nilinunua lori mpya.

src: Peter was excited to go to the Sanders rally in New Hampshire.
mt: Peter alikuwa na hamu ya kujia kwenye kikao cha Sanders katika New Hampshire.
ref: Peter alisisimka kwenda kwenye mkutano wa Sanders huko New Hampshire.

src: Josh was writing short stories for a researcher.
mt: Josh alikuwa akifundisha hadithi za kichwa kwa mwanafunzi.
ref: Josh alikuwa akiandika hadithi fupi kwa mtafiti.

src: Ethan loved to make Youtube videos.
mt: Ethan alivuta kutengeneza video za Youtube.
ref: Ethan alipenda kutengeneza video za Youtube.

src: I was walking in the park one day.
mt: Nilikuwa nikitembea katika mazingira mawili.
ref: Siku moja nilikuwa nikitembea kwenye bustani.

src: Gina and her friends were outside of the school library.
mt: Gina na wenzake walikuwa nje ya kibao cha shule.
ref: Gina na marafiki wake walikuwa nje ya maktaba ya shule.

src: Ana was swimming in the lake.
mt: Ana alikuwa akivuta katika ziwa.
ref: Ana alikuwa akiogelea ziwani.

src: A man bought his young son a bicycle.
mt: Mtu alimwamuru mtoto wake mchanga kwa gari la kujisikia.
ref: Mtu mmoja alimnunulia mwanawe mchanga baiskeli.

src: Jaime wanted to ask jack to go to the school dance with her.
mt: Jaime alitaka kutoa neno kwa jack kufika kwa dansi ya shule naye.
ref: Jaime alitaka kumwuliza jack aende naye kwenye densi ya shule.

src: Billy's friends thought that he was a scaredy cat.
mt: Wapenzi wa Billy walimwamini kwamba yeye ni kijana mchungu.
ref: Marafiki wa Billy walidhani kwamba alikuwa paka mwenye hofu.

src: Ana had just had a baby girl.
mt: Ana alikuwa amekuwa na mtoto mwanamke.
ref: Ana alikuwa amepata mtoto wa kike hivi karibuni.

src: Sally wanted to do something special for her mom.
mt: Sally alitaka kufanya kitu kipya kwa mama yake.
ref: Sally alitaka kufanya kitu cha kipekee kwa mama yake.

src: When I was sixteen I stole some hats.
mt: Nilipokuwa na miaka sita niliiba nywele.
ref: Wakati nilikuwa na umri wa miaka kumi na sita niliiba kofia kadhaa.

src: Matt started playing baseball when he was seven.
mt: Matt alianza kucheza baseball wakati alikuwa na miaka saba.
ref: Matt alianza kucheza basiboli akiwa na umri wa miaka saba.

src: It was Cara's sweet sixteen.
mt: Ilivyopatikana, ilikuwa siku ya kumi na sita ya kila mwaka.
ref: Ilikuwa siku ya kuzaliwa ya miaka kumi na sita ya Cara.

src: Darlene just moved to a new city and has no friends.
mt: Darlene alikuwa ameondoka katika mji mpya na hakuna rafiki.
ref: Darlene alihamia jiji jipya na hana marafiki.

src: Jake is one of my roommates.
mt: Jake ni mmoja wa wenzangu.
ref: Jake ni mmoja wa wakazi wenza wangu.

src: Yesterday I went to the animal shelter.
mt: Jana nilipita katika kituo cha wanyama.
ref: Jana nilienda kwenye makao ya wanyama.

src: Tony was tired of stale store bought bread.
mt: Tony alikuwa na shida ya kujifungua kwa mboga za kuchukua kutoka kwa biashara.
ref: Tony alikuwa amechoka na duka la zamani alilonunua mkate.

src: Selena was a music artist with a lot of fans.
mt: Selena alikuwa mwanamuziki na mafanaka mengi.
ref: Selena alikuwa msanii wa muziki na mashabiki wengi.

src: Sam loved breakfast.
mt: Sam alivijua chakula cha asubuhi.
ref: Sam alipenda kiamsha kinywa.

src: A young toddler was climbing up a chair in his living room.
mt: Kitoto cha chini cha miaka chache alikuwa akikimbilia kiti cha nyumbani chake.
ref: Mtoto mchanga alikuwa akipanda juu ya kiti sebuleni kwake.

src: Rick was trying to go to sleep.
mt: Rick alikuwa anavyojaribu kuanguka.
ref: Rick alikuwa anajaribu kwenda kulala.

src: My friends wanted to play Dungeons and Dragons last week.
mt: Wanawake wangu walikuwa wakitaka kucheza Dungeons na Dragons wiki iliyopita.
ref: Marafiki wangu walitaka kucheza Dungeons na Dragons wiki iliyopita.

src: Jen screamed out her window that no one cared about her.
mt: Jen alisema kwa kichwa chake cha kwanza kuwa hakuna anayemwamini.
ref: Jen alipiga kelele kutoka dirishani kwake kwamba hakuna mtu aliyemjali.

src: Logan and Maria decided to make a film together.
mt: Logan na Maria wakatarajia kufanya filamu pamoja.
ref: Logan na Maria waliamua kutengeneza filamu pamoja.

src: Sam was sitting on the train reading the paper.
mt: Sam alikuwa akifika kwenye treni akirejea gazeti.
ref: Sam alikuwa amekaa kwenye gari moshi akisoma karatasi.

src: A little girl wanted a puppy.
mt: Mchanga alikuwa anataka mbwa.
ref: Msichana mdogo alitaka mtoto wa mbwa.

src: Sara eagerly awaited December 1st to come.
mt: Sara alimwamini kwa kasi tarehe 1 Desemba kufika.
ref: Sara alisubiri kwa hamu Desemba 1 kufika.

src: Kate had been working out for months.
mt: Kate alikuwa anafanya mazoezi kwa mivulio.
ref: Kate alikuwa akifanya mazoezi kwa miezi kadhaa.

src: Robert was a math genius.
mt: Robert alikuwa mwanamitofali.
ref: Robert alikuwa na kipaji cha hesabu.

src: John was on a road trip.
mt: John alikuwa katika safari ya barabara.
ref: John alikuwa safarini.

src: In the autumn Samantha always gets a craving for apple cider.
mt: Katika mwezi wa kuchukua Samantha anapata hofu ya kuchukua pombe ya mabaka.
ref: Katika majira ya kupukutika kwa majani Samantha hupata hamu ya maji ya matofaa kila wakati.

src: John hadn't studied for his math test.
mt: John hakuwahi kusoma kwa ajili ya kujifunza kwa testi yake ya kisomo.
ref: John alikuwa hajasomea mtihani wake wa hesabu.

src: Four Outlaws camped in Blood Gulch.
mt: Watu wawili wakimbizi wakae katika Blood Gulch.
ref: Wahalifu wanne walipiga kambi katika Blood Gulch.

src: Josie found a spider underneath her bed.
mt: Josie alijua kichwa cha mnyama chini ya kitanda chake.
ref: Josie alipata buibui chini ya kitanda chake.

src: A man named Nick was walking down the street.
mt: Kiumbe jina lake Nick alikuwa akifika barabarani.
ref: Mwanamume anayeitwa Nick alikuwa akitembea barabarani.

src: Ken was on vacation in the tropics.
mt: Ken alikuwa katika kanda za tropiki.
ref: Ken alikuwa likizo katika nchi za joto.

src: I turned on the news one day.
mt: Nilimkamata habari moja siku moja.
ref: Nikawasha habari siku moja.

src: Anne always wanted one of the lilies that grew in the pond.
mt: Anne alikuwa anataka moja kati ya lili ambazo zilivyopanda katika kijiji.
ref: Kila wakati Anne alikuwa akitaka moja ya yungiyungi ambayo yalikua kwenye dimbwi.

src: Brian looked up a recipe for pork chops on the internet.
mt: Brian alipata njia ya kuchapisha nyama ya pori kwenye mtandao.
ref: Brian alitafuta maagizo ya mapishi ya nyama ya nguruwe kwenye intaneti.

src: James was at the gym playing basketball.
mt: James alikuwa katika gym alipokuwa anacheza mpira wa kikapu.
ref: James alikuwa kwenye ukumbi wa mazoezi akicheza mpira wa kikapu.

src: Gina was given lunch detention.
mt: Gina alipewa kipindi cha chakula cha kipigo.
ref: Gina alizuiwa kula chakula cha mchana.

src: Cole was given coal for Christmas as a gag gift.
mt: Kwa siku ya Krismasi, Cole alipewa machungu kwa ajili ya kujifungua.
ref: Cole alipewa makaa ya mawe kwa Krismasi kama zawadi ya kichekesho.

src: Mike was tired of work and needed a vacation.
mt: Mike alikuwa na ulemavu wa kazi na alitaka safari.
ref: Mike alikuwa amechoka na kazi na alihitaji likizo.

src: Tiffany bought a bag of microwave popcorn.
mt: Tiffany alipata kamba ya popcorn ya kuchoma.
ref: Tiffany alinunua begi la bisi ya wimbi maikro.

src: We went snow skiing for my wife's birthday.
mt: Kwa siku ya kuzaliwa kwa mke wangu tulipiga ndege kwa kufurika.
ref: Tulienda kuteleza kwa theluji siku ya mke wangu kuzaliwa.

src: Nan felt guilty because her pets were alone all day while she worked.
mt: Nan alikuwa na wasiwasi kwa sababu wanyama wake walikuwa wenyewe kwa siku nzima wakati alikuwa akifanya kazi.
ref: Nan alihisi ana hatia kwa sababu wanyama wake wa kipenzi walikuwa peke yao siku nzima akifanya kazi.

src: One Friday night we all pitched in and got a huge pizza.
mt: Jumamosi mmoja tulipanga pamoja na kupata pizza kubwa.
ref: Ijumaa moja usiku, sote tuliingia na tukanunua pizza kubwa.

src: Henry ran across a baked goods sales.
mt: Henry aliruka kwenye biashara ya vyakula vya kuchoma.
ref: Henry alikimbilia mauzo ya bidhaa zilizooka.

src: Bob had recently just purchased his dream car.
mt: Bob alikuwa ameipata gari lake la kushangaza.
ref: Hivi karibuni Bob alikuwa amenunua gari lake la alilotamani.

src: My aunt is a nurse.
mt: Shangazi yangu ni daktari.
ref: Shangazi yangu ni muuguzi.

src: Joe was walking home one night.
mt: Joe alikuwa anapita nyumbani mmoja usiku.
ref: Joe alikuwa akitembea nyumbani usiku mmoja.

src: Fred just bought some new patio furniture for his house.
mt: Fred ameipata vitu vya kifurushi cha kijani kwa nyumba yake.
ref: Fred alinunua fanicha mpya ya bustani ya nyumba yake.

src: Jordy ran outside happily.
mt: Jordy aliruka nje kwa furaha.
ref: Jordy alikimbia nje akiwa na furaha.

src: John was a student in law school.
mt: John alikuwa mwanafunzi katika chuo cha sheria.
ref: John alikuwa mwanafunzi katika shule ya sheria.

src: Harold was a mailman doing his job.
mt: Harold alikuwa mgeni wa barua kutokana na kazi yake.
ref: Harold alikuwa mtumaji barua akifanya kazi yake.

src: Amy wanted to get a manicure.
mt: Amy alitaka kupata kifua.
ref: Amy alitaka kufanyiwa utunzaji wa mikono na kucha.

src: David went to John's lake house for the weekend.
mt: David alipata nyumba ya John kwenye ziwa kwa wiki.
ref: David alienda kwenye nyumba ya ziwa ya John kwa ajili ya mwisho wa juma.

src: Nancy walked inside the subway store.
mt: Nancy alipita ndani ya duka la metro.
ref: Nancy aliingia ndani ya duka la chini ya ardhi.

src: After math class, I decided to go to the library.
mt: Baada ya kufika kwa kipindi cha kufundisha kwa masomo ya kemia, nilisikia kufika katika chumba cha kujifunza.
ref: Baada ya darasa la hesabu, niliamua kwenda kwenye maktaba.

src: It was a beautiful, warm, fall day.
mt: Ilikuwa siku ya kufurahia, ya nyota, na ya kawaida.
ref: Ilikuwa siku nzuri, yenye joto, ya majira ya kupukutika kwa majani.

src: On Saturday, we went to the beach.
mt: Jana, tulipokwenda kwenye pwani.
ref: Siku ya Jumamosi, tulienda pwani.

src: Jane wanted to learn how to juggle.
mt: Jane alitaka kujifunza kama kujitolea.
ref: Jane alitaka kujifunza jinsi ya kughushi.

src: Tim like pasta a lot.
mt: Tim anapenda pasta kwa kiasi kikubwa.
ref: Tim kama pasta sana.

src: Grandpa asked Betty if she wanted a drink.
mt: Jamaa alipiga Betty kama anataka pikipiki.
ref: Babu alimuuliza Betty iwapo anataka kinywaji.

src: Bella sat by the campfire with her friends.
mt: Bella alisimama kando ya moto wa kambi na wenzake.
ref: Bella akaketi kando ya moto wa kambi na marafiki zake.

src: Jasper notices that he has begun to develop dandruff in his hair.
mt: Jasper anavyoona kwamba yeye anafanya kujitambua kwa kuchipuka kwa kipande cha nywele.
ref: Jasper anagundua a kuwa ameanza kukuza mba kwenye nywele zake.

src: Jane needed a new kidney.
mt: Jane alihitaji mifupa mpya.
ref: Jane alihitaji figo mpya.

src: Amy arrived home from her vacation.
mt: Amy alifika nyumbani kutoka na safari yake.
ref: Amy aliwasili nyumbani kutoka likizo yake.

src: Paige was trying to quit smoking cigarettes.
mt: Paige alikuwa anatarajia kuacha kuchemsha sigari.
ref: Paige alikuwa akijaribu kuacha kuvuta sigara.

src: Gina was hungry.
mt: Gina alikuwa na ugonjwa wa njaa.
ref: Gina alikuwa na njaa.

src: Ray and his friends planned to go to the beach.
mt: Ray na wenzake walikuwa wamechambua kufika kwenye pwani.
ref: Ray na marafiki wake walipanga kwenda pwani.

src: Cristin went to a music festival.
mt: Cristin alifika katika tamasha la muziki.
ref: Cristin alienda kwenye tamasha la muziki.

src: Paul worked as order taker at a fast food drive thru.
mt: Paul alifanya kazi kama mtumiaji wa kawaida katika chakula cha kasi cha kuingia kwa gari.
ref: Paul alifanya kazi kama mpokeaji wa agizo kwenye mkahawa wa chakuka chepesi.

src: Larry regretted that he hadn't seen his aunt in months.
mt: Larry alikataa kwamba hakuona bibi yake kwa mivuli.
ref: Larry alijuta kwamba alikuwa hajaonana na shangazi yake kwa miezi.

src: Amy was going to buy coffee to beat her coffee crash.
mt: Amy alikuwa anatarajia kupata kahawa ili kubeba crash ya kahawa yake.
ref: Amy alikuwa akienda kununua kahawa ili kuridhisha hamu yake ya kahawa.

src: Reba worried that she was going to be a killer, like her father.
mt: Reba alijaribu kujua kama alikuwa mwanamke mwenye kushinda, kama baba yake.
ref: Reba alikuwa na wasiwasi kuwa atakuwa muuaji, kama baba yake.

src: Cindy cooked and cleaned every single day.
mt: Cindy alikuwa anapika na kuwachoma kila siku.
ref: Cindy alipika na kusafisha kila siku.

src: Jeb liked peppermint candy.
mt: Jeb alivipenda mafuta ya mlima.
ref: Jeb alipenda peremende kali.

src: Billy liked sitting by the pond.
mt: Billy alikuwa anapenda kushika kando ya kijiji.
ref: Billy alipenda kukaa karibu na dimbwi.

src: I decided to add a new fountain pen to my collection.
mt: Nilichagua kufanya kipaji cha peni ya kufunika mpya kwenye kikao changu.
ref: Niliamua kuongeza kalamu mpya kwenye mkusanyiko wangu.

src: Jen was invited to a Christmas party.
mt: Jen alitambuliwa kwa sherehe ya Krismasi.
ref: Jen alialikwa kwenye sherehe ya Krismasi.

src: Tom always wanted to be a singer.
mt: Tom alikuwa na ahadi ya kuwa mwanamuziki.
ref: Toma amekuwa akitaka kuwa mwimbaji.

src: Jay went to the chicken wing festival in Buffalo, New York.
mt: Jay alipata kufika katika tamasha la wingi za kuku Buffalo, New York.
ref: Jay alienda kwenye tamasha la mabawa ya kuku kule Buffalo, New York.

src: My neighbors are always playing loud music.
mt: Wananchi wangu wanasimama kila wakati.
ref: Majirani wangu huwa wanacheza muziki wa sauti kubwa kila wakati.

src: Joe was an amateur prospector.
mt: Joe alikuwa mwanamitaji wa kujifungua.
ref: Joe alikuwa mtafutaji mbichi.

src: Robert's dog passed away last month and he's still upset.
mt: Kutoka Robert, mbwa wake alifariki mwezi uliopita na anamwaga.
ref: Mbwa wa Robert alikufa mwezi uliopita na bado amekasirika.

src: Lulu was excited to try the new candy store in town.
mt: Lulu alikuwa na hamu ya kujifungua kwa duka la mafuta mpya katika mji.
ref: Lulu alisisimka kujaribu duka mpya la pipi mjini.

src: Teresa's mom was pregnant.
mt: Mama Teresa alikuwa na mimba.
ref: Mama ya Teresa alikuwa mjamzito.

src: Sal was nervous on his first day of high school.
mt: Sal alikuwa na wasiwasi kwa siku yake ya kwanza ya shule ya juu.
ref: Sal alikuwa na wasiwasi siku yake ya kwanza ya shule ya upili.

src: My roommate is a slob.
mt: Kaka yangu ni mchafu.
ref: Mkazi mwenza wangu ni mvivu.

src: Jason loves using a Macintosh at home but his office uses only PCs.
mt: Jason anapenda kutumia Macintosh nyumbani lakini ofisi yake inatumia tu PC.
ref: Jason anapenda kutumia Macintosh nyumbani lakini ofisi yake hutumia PC pekee.

src: My wife had MLK day off.
mt: Mke wangu alikuwa na siku ya MLK.
ref: Mke wangu alikuwa na siku ya kupumzika ya MLK.

src: I woke up one morning very hungry.
mt: Nilipokwama kwa mchana nilikuwa na nafasi kubwa.
ref: Niliamka asubuhi moja nikiwa na njaa sana.

src: Keri was babysitting her niece on a weekday.
mt: Keri alikuwa anamiminia binti yake kwa siku ya kawaida.
ref: Keri alikuwa akimlea mpwa wake wikendi.

src: Kim wakes up and decides to drive to the mall.
mt: Kim anapokwama anamchagua kufika kwa gari kwenye mabazarini.
ref: Kim aliamka na kuamua kwenda kwenye jengo lenye maduka mengi.

src: Erica had to decide whether to take her final or go help friends.
mt: Erica alitaka kuchagua kama atakapokuwa anafanya kazi yake ya mwisho au atakapokuwa anapokwenda kushirikiana na wenzake.
ref: Erica alilazimika kuamua kama atafanya mtihani wake wa mwisho au kwenda kuwasaidia marafiki.

src: My old neighbor used to take Halloween too far.
mt: Jirani yangu aliyekuwa mwenyeji mwenyeji alikuwa anatupa Halloween kwa wingi.
ref: Jirani wangu wa zamani alikuwa amezoea kuongezea chumvi Halloween.

src: Ben was waiting at the crossroads for a lift from his friend Tom.
mt: Ben alikuwa akimwaga kwa kifua cha barabara kutoka kwa mshangao wake Tom.
ref: Ben alikuwa akisubiri njia panda kupata lifti kutoka kwa rafiki yake Tom.

src: Barry loves bowling.
mt: Barry anapenda kubwaga.
ref: Barry anapenda mchezo wa kuvingirisha matufe.

src: The family prepared the food and packed it away.
mt: Wazazi wakawajibika na kufanya chakula na kufanya kama chakula.
ref: Familia iliandaa chakula na kukipanga.

src: Brad and Allison love Texas country music.
mt: Brad na Allison wanaamini muziki wa kijiji cha Texas.
ref: Brad na Allison walipenda muziki wa country wa Texas.

src: Melissa had wanted to be a news reporter on television.
mt: Melissa alitaka kuwa mwandishi wa habari kwenye televisheni.
ref: Melissa alitaka kuwa mwanahabari kwenye televisheni.

src: Dot was tired of the being the strict mom.
mt: Dot alikuwa na shida kubwa kwa kuwa mama mwenye uamuzi.
ref: Dot alichoshwa na kuwa mama mkali.

src: It snowed so hard that school was called off for the day.
mt: Kulitumbua kama vile huu kwa wingi kwamba shule ilipigwa kwa siku.
ref: Kulikuwa na theluji nyingi hadi shule ikabatilishwa siku hiyo.

src: I was walking to the mall.
mt: Nilikuwa nikitembea kuelekea kwa mabazarini.
ref: Nilikuwa nikitembea kwenye jengo lenye maduka mengi.

src: Bobby always enjoyed watching snow fall.
mt: Bobby alikuwa anavyotaka kufurahia mvua ya barafu.
ref: Bobby alifurahia kutazama mwanguko wa theluji kila mara.

src: Garry was nervous about his grades.
mt: Garry alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu daraja lake.
ref: Garry alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu gredi zake.

src: Evan complained about everything.
mt: Evan alisema kuhusu yote.
ref: Evan alilalamika kuhusu kila kitu.

src: John made fun of his sister when she said yoga was a workout.
mt: John alimkataa kaka yake wakati akasema yoga ni kazi ya kujitafiti.
ref: John alimkejeli dada yake aliposema yoga ni mazoezi.

src: Ava needed to go shopping with her two-year old.
mt: Ava alihitaji kufika kwa biashara na mtoto wake mmoja wa miaka miwili.
ref: Ava alitaka kwenda kununua vitu na mtoto wake wa miaka miwili.

src: Harry was tired of the hot summer days.
mt: Harry alikuwa na shida kwa siku za joto za kesho.
ref: Harry alichoshwa na siku zenye joto za majira ya joto.

src: Danny wanted  to  learn  how  to  make  fried  rice.
mt: Danny alitaka  kutafakari  jinsi  ya  kutengeneza  chakula  cha  ndizi  kama  chenye  nyama.
ref: Danny alitaka kujifunza jinsi ya kutengeneza wali wa kukaangwa.

src: Meghan was hired as a Scientist II for a company.
mt: Meghan alitajwa kama Mwanasayansi II kwa kampuni.
ref: Meghan aliajiriwa kama Mwanasayansi wa II wa kampuni.

src: Core broke her parents glass antique vase.
mt: Core alitupatia kichwa cha kifua cha kizungu cha wazazi chenye umri wa kile.
ref: Core alivunja chombo cha kale cha glasi cha wazazi wake.

src: Bob got a rubix cube for Christmas.
mt: Bob alipata rubix kwa siku ya Krismasi.
ref: Bob alipata kyubu ya Rubix kwa ajili ya Krisimasi.

src: Tim wanted to do something for his girlfriend on her birthday.
mt: Tim alitaka kufanya kitu kwa mke wake kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa.
ref: Tim alitaka kumfanyia kitu mpenzi wake siku yake ya kuzaliwa.

src: Suzie decided to make her grandmother's spaghetti sauce.
mt: Suzie aliamua kufanya chakula cha spaghetti cha baba yake.
ref: Suzie aliamua kumtengenezea bibi yake sosi ya spageti.

src: Last weekend I wanted to buy some shoes.
mt: Jumamosi nilikuwa nataka kupata magari.
ref: Wikendi iliyopita nilitaka kununua viatu kadhaa.

src: Gabby didn't have much money.
mt: Gabby hakikuwa na pesa nyingi.
ref: Gabby hakuwa na pesa nyingi.

src: Annie's grandfather needed a heart transplant.
mt: Baba yake Annie alitaka kupata mabavu.
ref: Babu ya Annie alihitaji kupandikizwa moyo.

src: When I was five, I moved.
mt: Kwa siku moja, nilimwaga.
ref: Nilipokuwa na umri wa miaka mitano, nilihama.

src: Larry was scared of heights.
mt: Larry alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu kina.
ref: Larry alikuwa akiogopa vimo vya juu.

src: Jeff is a very quick thinker.
mt: Jeff ni mtu mwenye fikra za kasi.
ref: Jeff ni mtu anayefikiria kwa haraka sana.

src: Binh decided to wash her cat.
mt: Binh aliamua kuchimba kiti chake.
ref: Binh aliamua kumuosha paka wake.

src: I ordered a family meal at a Chinese restaurant.
mt: Nilimkamata chakula cha familia katika restorani cha China.
ref: Niliagiza chakula cha familia katika mkahawa wa Kichina.

src: Humberto likes to jump on a trampoline.
mt: Humberto anapenda kupiga kwa trampolini.
ref: Humberto alipenda kuruka kwenye turubali.

src: Matt met Tammy at a nightclub.
mt: Matt alijifunua na Tammy katika klabu.
ref: Matt alikutana na Tammy katika klabu ya usiku.

src: Ben wasn't paying any attention as he walked past the windowsill.
mt: Ben hakupenda kujifunza wakati akiendesha kwa mabati.
ref: Ben hakuwa makini alipokuwa akitembea akipita kizingiti cha dirisha.

src: Janet was afraid of flying.
mt: Janet alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu ndege.
ref: Janet aliogopa kupanda ndege.

src: It was Nate's turn to sweep the floor this week.
mt: Kweli, ilikuwa wakati wa Nate kufanya kazi ya kuchimba kwa siku hizi.
ref: Ilikuwa ni zamu ya Nate kufagia chini wiki hii.

src: Elena was a little person and was very insecure.
mt: Yule mwanamke alikuwa mwenye kipindi cha kichwani na alikuwa na uwezo mdogo.
ref: Elena alikuwa mtu mdogo na asiyejiamini hata kidogo.

src: When Jay found out her older sister was pregnant, she was nervous.
mt: Jaya alijua kuwa dada yake mkubwa alikuwa na mimba, alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Wakati Jay aligundua kwamba dada yake mkubwa alikuwa mjamzito, alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: Jon was thirsty.
mt: Jon alikuwa na shida ya picha.
ref: Jon alikuwa na kiu.

src: Daria bought a television for her living room.
mt: Daria alipata televisheni kwa soko lake la nyumbani.
ref: Daria alinunua televisheni ya sebule yake.

src: White roses were Lilly's favorite flower.
mt: Rose za weupe zilikuwa dhabihu ya Lilly.
ref: Maua meupe ya waridi ndio maua aliyoyapenda sasa Lilly.

src: Jimmy's mother was sick in the hospital.
mt: Baba yake Jimmy alikuwa na ugonjwa katika hospitali.
ref: Mama ya Jimmy alikuwa mgonjwa hospitalini.

src: Sammy had a terrible stomach ache one morning.
mt: Sammy alikuwa na nguzo mbaya za mdomo mmoja asubuhi.
ref: Sammy alikuwa na maumivu mabaya ya tumbo asubuhi moja.

src: Karmen was all ready for her trip to Tanzania.
mt: Karmen alikuwa tayari kwa safari yake Tanzania.
ref: Karmen alikuwa tayari kwa safari yake ya Tanzania.

src: Sandy lived in New York.
mt: Sandy alikuwa anamiliki New York.
ref: Sandy aliishi New York.

src: Quentin ordinarily does not enjoy going to company events.
mt: Quentin kwa kawaida hana nafasi ya kuenda katika majadiliano ya kampuni.
ref: Kwa kawaida Quentin hafurahii kwenda kwenye matukio ya kampuni.

src: I use Mister Spice no sodium sauce.
mt: Nina matumizi ya Mister Spice no sodium sauce.
ref: Mimi hutumia Mister Spice bila sosi ya sodiamu.

src: Dan wanted to go to school on Halloween dressed as the Devil.
mt: Dan alitaka kujifungua shule kwa Halloween kama Mungu Mwadui.
ref: Dan alitaka kwenda shuleni siku ya Halloween akivaa kama Shetani.

src: Franz decides he would like to be closer to his family.
mt: Franz anataka kuwa karibu zaidi na familia yake.
ref: Franz aliamua angependa kuwa karibu na familia yake.

src: I bought a horned toad when I was ten.
mt: Nilimwaga kinyonga kipande kwa kipande wakati nilikuwa na miaka kumi.
ref: Nilinunua mjusi mwenye pembe nilipokuwa na miaka kumi.

src: I met Nancy for the first time today.
mt: Nilipozunguka na Nancy mara ya kwanza leo.
ref: Nilikutana na Nancy kwa mara ya kwanza leo.

src: Yesterday Kelly headed to cvs to buy some candy.
mt: Jana Kelly alipitia cvs ili kupata tofa.
ref: Jana Kelly alienda cvs kununua pipi kadhaa.

src: Don's first day at the dock's had some hiccups.
mt: Don's siku ya kwanza kwenye mabanda ya maziwa ilikuwa na mabomu.
ref: Siku ya kwanza ya Don bandarini ilikuwa na matatizo kiasi.

src: Dal needed money to go to college.
mt: Dal alitaka pesa ili aende shule.
ref: Dal alitaka pesa za kwenda chuo cha elimu.

src: Today was Picture day at school.
mt: Leo ni siku ya picha katika shule.
ref: Leo ilikuwa siku ya Kupigwa picha shuleni.

src: Nila's mom was diagnosed with stage four cancer.
mt: Mama ya Nila alitambuliwa na saratani ya kike ya kadi ya nne.
ref: Mama ya Nila aligunduliwa kuwa ana saratani iliofika hatua ya nne.

src: A mother looked at the face of her newborn baby boy.
mt: Mama alimwangamia mwenyeji wake wa mwanaume mchanga.
ref: Mama aliangalia uso wa mtoto wake mchanga wa kiume.

src: Jessica and her brothers were very excited for Christmas.
mt: Jessica na wana wake waliwaza sana kwa siku ya Krismasi.
ref: Jessica na ndugu zake walisisimka sana kuhusu Krisimasi.

src: Jan and Kim were both using the Montessori education model.
mt: Jan na Kim wote walikuwa wakifundishwa kwa mfumo wa Montessori.
ref: Jan na Kim walikuwa wote wakitumia mfumo wa elimu wa Montessori.

src: The first day of school I walked there with two of my closest friends.
mt: Jumanne nilipata shule nilimwambia wenzangu wawili wangu wakubwa.
ref: Siku ya kwanza ya shule nilitembea hapo pamoja na marafiki wangu wawili wa karibu zaidi.

src: Jeff was angry that his neighbor's dog always barked in the morning.
mt: Jeff alikuwa na hasira kwamba mbwa wa jirani alikuwa akimwimbi kila mara asubuhi.
ref: Jeff alikasirika kwamba mbwa wa jirani yake alikuwa akibweka asubuhi siku zote.

src: Holly asked her brother to put suntan lotion on her back.
mt: Holly alimwambia ndugu yake aangaze kwa mafuta ya kuzunguka.
ref: Holly alimwomba ndugu yake kumpaka mafuta ya kukinga ngozi mgongoni kwake.

src: I used to make fun of my wife for having a nightlight.
mt: Nilikuwa ninafanya kujifanya na mke wangu kwa kufanya kazi ya kibinafsi.
ref: Nilikuwa nikimkejeli mke wangu kwa kuwa na taa ya usiku.

src: Amy decided to move from Wisconsin to Florida.
mt: Amy aliamua kuhamia Wisconsin hadi Florida.
ref: Amy aliamua kuhama kutoka Wisconsin hadi Florida.

src: Kathy went shopping.
mt: Kathy alipata kazi.
ref: Kathy alienda kununua vitu.

src: Amayah's birthday is coming up.
mt: Kipindi cha kuzaliwa cha Amayah kimefika.
ref: Siku ya kuzaliwa ya Amayah inakuja.

src: The boys and I went to the beach today.
mt: Jamaa na mimi tulipanda pwani leo.
ref: Wavulana na mimi tulienda ufuoni leo.

src: It was Friday night so I decided to rent a movie.
mt: Nilikuwa jumamosi jioni, kwa hiyo nilisikia kuuza filamu.
ref: Ilikuwa Ijumaa usiku kwa hivyo nikaamua kukodisha filamu.

src: Paula wrote a lot of spoken word poetry.
mt: Paula alikwambia mengi kwa kushikwa kwa shairi.
ref: Paula aliandika mashairi mengi ya maneno yanayoambatanishwa.

src: After getting off the school bus, I realized that my phone is missing.
mt: Baada ya kupata ndege ya shule, nilielewa kwamba simu yangu inapotea.
ref: Baada ya kushuka kwenye basi la shule, nikagundua simu yangu inakosekana.

src: Today was Iris's fifth birthday!
mt: Leo ni siku ya tano ya Iris!
ref: Leo ilikuwa siku ya kuzaliwa ya tano ya Iris!

src: Tina always wore a red bikini when she went to the beach.
mt: Tina alivyokuwa anapokaa kwenye pwani alivyokuwa anavaa bikini ya kijivu.
ref: Tina alivaa bikini nyekundu siku zote alipoenda ufuoni.

src: Ted had always dreamed of being a homeowner.
mt: Ted alikuwa anamshangaa kufikia kujitolea kama mwenyeji.
ref: Siku zote Ted ametamani kuwa mmiliki wa nyumba.

src: Evie wandered about the castle for hours.
mt: Evie alivuka kwa muda mrefu katika ngome.
ref: Evie alishangazwa kuhusu kasri hiyo kwa saa nyingi.

src: Ed and his twin Ethan were looking at women online.
mt: Ed na kaka yake Ethan walikuwa wakivuta wanawake kwenye mitandao.
ref: Ed na pacha wake Ethan walikuwa wakitafuta wanawake mtandaoni.

src: Marco is starting a new job today.
mt: Marco anatarajia kuanza kazi yake mpya leo.
ref: Marco anaanza kazi mpya leo.

src: Tim wanted to travel overseas.
mt: Tim alitaka kuendesha ndege kwa nchi nyingine.
ref: Tim alitaka kusafiri ng'ambo.

src: Lucy had a test tomorrow at school and she barely studied.
mt: Lucy alikuwa na ujazo kesho katika shule na alikuwa na kujifungua.
ref: Lucy alikuwa na mtihani kesho shuleni na hakuwa ameusomea hata kidogo.

src: Fred liked mystery novels.
mt: Fred alikuwa anapenda vitabu vya kushindwa.
ref: Fred alipenda riwaya za fumbo.

src: Tia owned her own bakery.
mt: Tia alikuwa mwenye bisi yake.
ref: Tia alimiliki duka lake mwenyewe la mikate.

src: Sarah went with her friends to the water park.
mt: Sarah alipata na wenzake kwa mabwawa.
ref: Susan alienda na marafiki wake kwenye bustani ya maji.

src: Jeb was building statues out of rocks.
mt: Jeb alikuwa anabuni vitabu vya kimaandishi.
ref: Jeb alikuwa akiunda sanamu kutoka kwa mawe.

src: Jeff is going on a field trip to the rainy forest with his class.
mt: Jeff anatarajia safari ya kijiji kwa kundi lake.
ref: Jeff anaenda safari ya kimasomo kwa msitu wa mvua na darasa lake.

src: Dani was a nurse in the ICU.
mt: Dani alikuwa daktari katika ICU.
ref: Dani alikuwa muuguzi katika ICU.

src: Gina was at her friend Ruth's house.
mt: Gina alikuwa katika nyumba ya mshirika wake Ruth.
ref: Gina alikuwa katika nyumba ya rafiki yake Ruth.

src: Ella spent a day in the sun.
mt: Ella alipumzika kwa siku moja kwenye anga.
ref: Ella alitumia siku yake kwenye jua.

src: Neil had just arrived in Kenya.
mt: Neil alikuwa amekaribia Kenya.
ref: Neil alikuwa amewasili Kenya tu.

src: Gina decided to bake an apple pie for the first time.
mt: Gina aliamua kuchapisha kwa mara ya kwanza.
ref: Gina aliamua kuoka pai ya tofaa kwa mara ya kwanza.

src: Pablo wanted a jawbreaker.
mt: Pablo alitaka kipande cha kifua.
ref: Pablo alitaka peremende ya jawbreaker.

src: Anna rented out a warehouse for a big party.
mt: Anna alikuwa ameleta gari la kuleta kwa shamba kubwa kwa ajili ya kipindi cha kufanya mazishi.
ref: Anna alikodisha bohari kwa sherehe kubwa.

src: Oscar headed over to the nursery to find a tree to plant in his yard.
mt: Oscar alipita kwenye shule ya kujifunza ili kupata mti kwa kutunza katika kijiji chake.
ref: Oscar alienda kwenye bustani ya mimea kupata mti wa kupanda katika yadi yake.

src: There was a major basketball game in the gymnasium.
mt: Kuna mechi kubwa ya mpira wa kati katika kanisani.
ref: Kulikwa na mchezo mkuu wa mpira wa kikapu katika ukumbi wa mazoezi.

src: Dirk was a fine pianist.
mt: Dirk alikuwa pianista mzuri.
ref: Dirk alikuwa mcheza piano bora.

src: Eva loved the squirrels in her yard.
mt: Eva alivipenda nyumbani wanyama wadogo wanaoishi katika mazingira yake.
ref: Eva alipenda kindi katika yadi yake.

src: Andy loved the beach.
mt: Andy alivijibu bahari.
ref: Andy alipenda ufuoni.

src: I bought a phone case with a lanyard.
mt: Nilimaliza kifaa cha simu na lanyard.
ref: Nilinunua mfuko wa simu ulio na kamba.

src: I changed the sheets on my bed last week.
mt: Nilichangia kitanda cha kifua cha kawaida wiki iliyopita.
ref: Nilibadilisha shuka kwenye kitanda changu wiki iliyopita.

src: Chase really wanted a new toy.
mt: Chase alikuwa na hamu ya kupata duka mpya.
ref: Chase alitaka sana kitu kipya cha kuchezea.

src: Renee was inspired by the music of Eddie Van Halen.
mt: Renee alitokana na muziki wa Eddie Van Halen.
ref: Renee alitiwa moyo na muziki wa Eddie Van Halen.

src: Bill went fishing and caught a lot of fish.
mt: Bill alifika kwa samaki na kuuza nyingi.
ref: Bill alienda kuvua samaki na kupata samaki wengi.

src: Last week the internet went out.
mt: Jana wiki interneti ilipotea.
ref: Wiki iliyopita intaneti ilipotea.

src: All Tim's life, he wanted to make music.
mt: Timoteo alikuwa na ahadi yake kufanya muziki.
ref: Katika maisha yote ya Tim, alitaka kutengeneza muziki.

src: Alex suspected that his cat Tigger might have fleas.
mt: Alex alimwamini kwamba kiti chake Tigger itakuwa na kifafa.
ref: Alex alishuku kwamba paka wake Tigger anaweza kuwa na viroboto.

src: Haley was a young scientist at a famous laboratory.
mt: Haley alikuwa mwanasayansi mmoja wa wachanga katika laburiti maarufu.
ref: Haley alikuwa mwanasayansi mdogo katika maabara mashuhuri.

src: Sam wanted to throw a party.
mt: Sam alitaka kutoa shamba.
ref: Sam alitaka kupanga sherehe.

src: Katie couldn't sleep.
mt: Katie hakutaka kulala.
ref: Katie hakuweza kulala.

src: Tom was talking to his wife Becky who had a bad day at work.
mt: Tom alikuwa akizungumza na mkewe Becky ambaye alikuwa na siku mbaya katika kazi yake.
ref: Tom alikuwa akiongea na mke wake Becky ambaye alikuwa na siku mbaya.

src: They had to pick out a stove for their new house.
mt: Walikataza kupanga moto kwa nyumba yao mpya.
ref: Walilazimika kuchukua stovu kwa ajili ya nyumba yao mpya.

src: Jasmine did not study for her big math test.
mt: Jasmini hakufundishwa kwa kujifungua kwa testi kubwa la hisabati.
ref: Jasmine hakusomea mtihani wake mkubwa wa hesabu.

src: Sam moved to Los Angeles to become a movie star.
mt: Sam alikuwa na nia ya kuwa mwigizaji wa filamu katika mji wa Los Angeles.
ref: Sam alihamia Los Angeles ili kuwa mwigizaji mashuhuri wa sinema.

src: Ben woke up late.
mt: Ben alipata kujifungua mapema.
ref: Ben aliamka kuchelewa.

src: Darren was late to work and could not find his car keys.
mt: Darren alikuwa mlimoni kwa kazi na hakutambua kwa nini angekuwa na nyumba yake.
ref: Darren alichelewa kwenda kazini na hakuweza kupata funguo za gari lake.

src: I had a job interview last week.
mt: Nilikuwa na mazungumzo ya kazi la wiki iliyopita.
ref: Nilikuwa na mahojiano ya kazi wiki iliyopita.

src: Harry loved hockey.
mt: Harry alivijua hoki.
ref: Harry alipenda mchezo wa mpira wa magongo.

src: Little Sue was riding an elephant at the zoo.
mt: Kijana Sue alikuwa akimwaga mbwa mwitu katika zoo.
ref: Sue mdogo alikuwa akimwendesha ndovu katika bustani la wanyama.

src: Hannah was an amazing artist.
mt: Hannah alikuwa mwanamitindo mwenye uwezo mkubwa.
ref: Hannah alikuwa msanii wa ajabu.

src: Jim was taking out the garbage.
mt: Jim alikuwa akifanya kazi za kuharibu.
ref: Jim alikuwa akitoa takataka nje.

src: I hate doing laundry.
mt: Ninamchukia kufanya kazi ya kujinamisha.
ref: Ninachukia kufua nguo.

src: James was twelve Year's old and loved food.
mt: James alikuwa na umri wa miaka kumi na mbili na alikuwa na uangalifu kwa chakula.
ref: James alikuwa na umri wa miaka kuma na mbili na alipenda chakula.

src: Lee knew her mom needed new gloves and could not afford them.
mt: Lee alijua mama yake alihitaji viatu vya kawaida na hakupata.
ref: Lee alijua mama yake alitaka glovu mpya na hangeweza kuzinunua.

src: Jennifer was professional copywriter in a large city.
mt: Jennifer alikuwa mwandishi wa kawaida wa ripoti katika mji mkubwa.
ref: Jennifer alikuwa mwandishi wa matangazo mtaalamu katika mji mkubwa.

src: Lorraine was a softball player.
mt: Lorraine alikuwa mchezaji wa mpira wa kidole cha kati.
ref: Lorraine alikuwa mchezaji wa softiboli.

src: Abby and Tammy were the best of friends.
mt: Abby na Tammy walikuwa wapendao wakubwa.
ref: Abby na Tammy walikuwa marafiki wakubwa.

src: Last night there was a big lightning storm.
mt: Jana kulikuwa na mvua ya mawimbi kubwa.
ref: Usiku wa jana kulikuwa na dhoruba kubwa ya umeme.

src: Sal was mad that his parents were moving.
mt: Sal alikuwa na hasira kwamba wazazi wake wamehamia.
ref: Sal alikuwa amekasirika kwa sababu wazazi wake walikuwa wanahama.

src: Lydia had a strange dream last night.
mt: Lydia alikuwa na kushindwa kwa macho mchana jana.
ref: Lydia aliota na ndoto ya kushangaza jana usiku.

src: Alex needed groceries.
mt: Alex alitaka vyakula.
ref: Alex alihitaji mboga.

src: Yolanda hates roller coasters.
mt: Yolanda anahisiwa kuwa hatazi mabanda.
ref: Yolanda anachukia treni za burudani.

src: One thing that Tina wanted to do in NYC was go to a hot dog stand.
mt: Moja kati ya vitu ambavyo Tina alitaka kufanya katika NYC ilikuwa kuingia kwa kikao cha kuku.
ref: Jambo moja ambalo Tina alitaka kufanya huko NYC ilikuwa kwenda kwenye standi ya soseji.

src: Tammy likes to crochet.
mt: Tammy anapenda kuchipua.
ref: Tammy anapenda kufuma kroshia.

src: Melinda wanted to go see a scary movie.
mt: Melinda alitaka kufika kwa filamu ya kiharushee.
ref: Melinda alitaka kwenda kutazama filamu ya kutisha.

src: Lamar learns that he will have unexpected houseguests one afternoon.
mt: Lamar anajua kwamba atakapata mabwana wakifika kwa ajili ya kushiriki nafasi moja.
ref: Lamar anagundua kuwa atakuwa na wageni wasiotarajiwa alasiri moja.

src: My niece applied for a job at the RMV two Year's ago.
mt: Jamaa yangu alikuwa anatumia kazi katika ofisi ya RMV miaka miwili iliyopita.
ref: Mpwa wangu aliomba kazi huko RMV miaka miwili iliyopita.

src: Lela was diagnosed with cancer five years ago.
mt: Lela alidhaniwa na saratani kwa miaka minne iliyopita.
ref: Lela aligunduliwa kuwa na saratani miaka mitano iliyopita.

src: Fred was a new student in class.
mt: Fred alikuwa mwanafunzi mpya katika shule.
ref: Fred alikuwa mwanafunzi mpya darasani.

src: Joyce was adopted by her foster mother when she was 5 Year's old.
mt: Joyce alitupwa na mama yake mwenza wakati alikuwa na umri wa miaka 5.
ref: Joyce alichukuliwa na mama mlezi wake akiwa na umri wa miaka 5.

src: Horatio had always been afraid of eating a raw oyster.
mt: Horatio alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu kula oyster bila kupikia.
ref: Horatio alikuwa akiogopa kula chaza bichi.

src: Tom liked to herd cattle.
mt: Tom alikuwa anavyotaka kuharibu ng'ombe.
ref: Tom alipenda kuchunga ng'ombe.

src: Alyssa got some coffee on the way to work.
mt: Alyssa alipata chai kwa njia ya kazi.
ref: Alyssa alipata kahawa akiwa njiani kwenda kazini.

src: John was driving down the highway.
mt: John alikuwa anavyoendesha barabara.
ref: John alikuwa akiendesha gari kwenye barabara kuu.

src: Ben wanted to win the costume contest at work this year.
mt: Ben alitaka kushinda mashindano ya kanzu katika kazi yake hii mwaka.
ref: Ben alitaka kushinda mashindano ya mavazi kazini mwaka huu.

src: My mom asked if she can borrow $100 dollars from me.
mt: Mama yangu alipiga simu na kusema kwamba anataka kuuza $100.
ref: Mama yangu aliuliza ikiwa anaweza kukopa $100 kutoka kwangu.

src: Kelly always had the driest hair.
mt: Kelly alikuwa na nywele zinazozunguka kwa kasi.
ref: Kelly amekuwa na nywele zilizokauka zaidi.

src: Sarah had a fear of being around others.
mt: Sarah alikuwa na wasiwasi wa kuwa katika kundi.
ref: Sarah alikuwa na hofu ya kuwa karibu na wengine.

src: Ellen was at her doctor's office.
mt: Ellen alikuwa katika ofisi ya daktari.
ref: Ellen alikuwa ofisini kwa daktari wake.

src: Zoey was taunted by her friends for having a strange name.
mt: Zoey alitupwa na wapenzi wake kwa jina la ajabu.
ref: Zoey alidhihakiwa na marafiki wake kwa kuwa na jina la ajabu.

src: Miranda just got her driver's license.
mt: Miranda yupo kwenye hati ya kufanya kazi.
ref: Miranda alipata leseni yake ya udereva hivi karibuni.

src: Bob went to the doctor.
mt: Bob alipata daktari.
ref: Bob alienda kwa daktari.

src: Lonnie was trying to figure out what majors to take in college.
mt: Lonnie alivyopenda kujifunza kama kujitegemea kwa masomo yake katika chuo.
ref: Lonnie alikuwa akijaribu kujua utaalamu atasoma chuoni.

src: Sherry liked to explore the outdoors.
mt: Sherry alikuwa anavyopenda kufurahia nchi ya nje.
ref: Sherry alipenda kutazama maeneo na nje.

src: Phil went for a walk in the park.
mt: Phil alikuwa akifika katika mazingira ya mazingira.
ref: Phil alienda kutembea kwenye bustani.

src: Dorothy's cat was pregnant.
mt: Kiti cha Dorothy lilikuwa na mimba.
ref: Paka wa Dorothy alikuwa mjamzito.

src: Jeremy's mother didn't approve of his lifestyle.
mt: Baba yake Jeremy alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu maisha yake.
ref: Mama ya Jeremy hakukubaliana na mtindo wake wa maisha.

src: Terry realizes his neighborhood has become covered in litter.
mt: Terry anajua eneo lake linajaa maji.
ref: Terry akatambua mtaa wake umejaa takataka.

src: I wanted to take a shower after work.
mt: Nilikuwa nataka kuchukua maji ya kuchimba baada ya kazi.
ref: Nilitaka kuoga baada ya kazi.

src: I approached the front of my school.
mt: Nilipita mbele ya shule yangu.
ref: Nilikaribia mbele ya shule yangu.

src: Barry loved to lift weights.
mt: Barry alikuwa anapenda kufanya kazi za kifua.
ref: Barry alipenda kuinua vyuma.

src: Amber had been working a lot lately.
mt: Amber alikuwa anafanya kazi nyingi sana kwa sasa.
ref: Amber alikuwa akifanya kazi sana juzijuzi.

src: Carl joined the military right after high school.
mt: Carl alijiunga na jeshi wakati wa kufikia shule ya juu.
ref: Carl alijiunga na jeshi mara tu baada ya shule ya upili.

src: Eddie liked to watch people use metal detectors on the beach.
mt: Eddie alikuwa anavyozingatia watu wanaoendesha mabomba ya nje kwenye pwani.
ref: Eddie alipenda kutazama watu wakitumia vigunduzi vya chuma huko pwani.

src: When I first met Janice, she didn't know how to crack a walnut.
mt: Kwanza nilipozunguka na Janice, alikuwa hajui jinsi ya kubadilisha walnut.
ref: Wakati nilikutana na Janice kwa mara ya kwanza, hakujua jinsi ya kupasua jozi.

src: Amy walked home from volleyball practice alone.
mt: Amy alikuwa anapita nyumbani kwa kushirikiana kwa michezo ya mpira wa vikundi bila msaada.
ref: Amy alitembea nyumbani kutoka kwa mazoezi ya voliboli peke yake.

src: Beth was taking a shower when she heard a loud knock on the door.
mt: Beth alikuwa akifuta maji wakati akasikia kipigo kikikaa kwa kipimo kikubwa.
ref: Beth alikuwa akioga aliposikia mlango ukibishwa kwa nguvu.

src: Joe went to college for art.
mt: Joe alifika chuo kwa ajili ya sanaa.
ref: Joe alienda chuo kikuu kusomea sanaa.

src: Bob picked up his glasses from the table.
mt: Bob alipata kofia yake kutoka kwa meza.
ref: Bob alichukua glasi zake mezani.

src: I was really nervous before my first middle school dance.
mt: Nilikuwa na wasiwasi sana kabla ya kwanza kwa ndege ya shule ya sekondari.
ref: Nilikuwa na woga sana kabla ya densi yangu ya kwanza ya shule ya kati.

src: My friend went out one night looking to find love.
mt: Rafiki yangu alipita kwenye usiku mmoja kwa ajili ya kupata upendo.
ref: Rafiki yangu alitoka usiku mmoja akitafuta kupata mpenzi.

src: Benjamin went to the park today.
mt: Benjamin alipita katika mazingira ya kijani leo.
ref: Benjamin alienda kwenye bustani leo.

src: Megan and I walked home from school near a busy street.
mt: Megan na mimi tulipita nyumbani kutoka shule karibu na barabara ya kujitegemea.
ref: Mimi na Megan tulitembea nyumbani kutoka shuleni karibu na barabara yenye shughuli nyingi.

src: Kelly decided to have a house party.
mt: Kelly aliamua kutoa nafasi kwa wadau.
ref: Kelly aliamua kufanya sherehe ya nyumbani.

src: James realizes one afternoon that he hasn't left his house all day.
mt: James anajua mchana kwamba yeye hajakwenda nyumbani kabisa kwa siku moja.
ref: James anatambua alasiri moja kwamba hajatoka nyumbani kwake siku nzima.

src: Lars realizes that a lot of snow had accumulated on his deck.
mt: Lars anajua kwamba kiasi kikubwa cha barafu lilitunzwa kwenye barabara yake.
ref: Lars anatambua kuwa theluji nyingi zilikuwa zimekusanyika kwenye sitaha yake.

src: Matt suspected his wife Ginny was having an affair.
mt: Matt alimwamini mke wake Ginny alikuwa anafanya njozi.
ref: Matt alishuku mkewe Ginny alikuwa ameanzisha uhusiano nje ya ndoa.

src: Mike used to play racketball with Perry.
mt: Mike alikuwa anacheza racketball na Perry.
ref: Mike alikuwa akicheza mpira wa raketi na Perry.

src: Sydney needed to do the laundry.
mt: Sydney alitaka kufanya kazi ya kuchoma.
ref: Sydney alihitaji kufua nguo.

src: There was a hurricane coming and we had to evacuate.
mt: Kuna mvua ya furaha inakaribia na kwa hiyo tulitaka kuondoka.
ref: Kulikuwa na kimbunga kinachokuka na tulilazimika kuhama.

src: Tom bit into the Snickers bar and felt a jabbing pain.
mt: Tom alifuta baraza la Snickers na kufurudia kipigo.
ref: Tom aliuma pao wa Snickers na akahisi maumivu ya kuchoma.

src: Rufus wakes up and notices that his hat is gone.
mt: Rufus anapokwama anavyoona yeye hati yake imepotea.
ref: Rufus anaamka na kugundua kuwa kofia yake haipo.

src: Alexia was excited to get a new dog.
mt: Alexia alikuwa na hamu ya kupata mbwa mpya.
ref: Alexia alisisimka kupata mbwa mpya.

src: Dan wanted to find the perfect gift for his mother's birthday.
mt: Dan alitaka kupata zawadi nzuri kwa siku ya kuzaliwa ya mama yake.
ref: Dan alitaka kupata zawadi nzuri kwa ajili ya siku ya kuzaliwa ya mama yake.

src: Bill was poor.
mt: Bill alikuwa mdogo.
ref: Bill alikuwa maskini.

src: Jane loved her new high heels.
mt: Jane alivuta vipande vya kawaida vya kipande cha kawaida.
ref: Jane alipenda viatu vyake vipya vyenye visigino virefu.

src: Jose is an immigrant.
mt: Jose ni mwananchi.
ref: Jose ni mhamiaji.

src: Hannah was feeling very stiff and inflexible.
mt: Hannah alikuwa na nguvu na uwezo wa kujitahidi.
ref: Hana alikuwa anahusu mgumu na asiyeweza kupindika.

src: The teacher announced that there would be a pop quiz.
mt: Mwalimu alizungumza kwamba kuna ujuzi wa kujibu.
ref: Mwalimu alitangaza kwamba kutakuwa na jaribio la ghafla.

src: Carla was worried that her daughter Ann was overextending herself.
mt: Carla alikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba binti yake Ann alikuwa anafanya kazi zaidi kuliko alivyotaka.
ref: Carla alikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba binti yake Ann alikuwa anajiongezea kupita kiasi.

src: Gina's family was visiting her grandma in Illinois.
mt: Familia ya Gina ilikuwa ikifika kwa baba yake mmoja nchini Illinois.
ref: Familia ya Gina ilikuwa ikimtembelea bibi yake huko Illinois.

src: James had a birthday coming.
mt: James alikuwa na siku ya kuzaliwa kufika.
ref: James alikuwa na siku ya kuzaliwa inayokaribia.

src: A young girl named Taylor had always wanted a pet.
mt: Jina lake ni Taylor, mtoto mchanga aliyemwamini kwa muda mrefu kwa kujua kama atakuwa na wanyama wakubwa.
ref: Msichana mdogo anayeitwa Taylor alikuwa akitaka mnyama kipenzi sana.

src: Zeke was throwing a Halloween party.
mt: Zeke alikuwa akifanya sherehe ya Halloween.
ref: Zeke alikuwa akifanya sherehe ya Halloween.

src: Janet always wanted to be in movies.
mt: Janet alitaka kuwa katika filamu.
ref: Janet amekuwa akitaka kuwa kwenye filamu.

src: Marge begged her husband Bill for a backyard pool.
mt: Margaret alimwomba mke wake Bill kwa kuuza kwa kifua cha nyumbani.
ref: Marge alimsihi mumewe Bill kwa ajili ya dimbwi la nyuma ya nyumba.

src: Rosie the quarter horse whinnied irritably.
mt: Rosie the quarter horse alimwimbiwa kwa kujitetea.
ref: Rosie farasi aina ya quarter alipiga kelele kwa hasira.

src: Rick was at the bar when he saw a driver license on the ground.
mt: Rick alikuwa katika bar aliposema kipato cha kudharau cha kifahari kwenye ardhi.
ref: Rick alikuwa kwenye baa alipoona leseni ya udereva chini.

src: I started a diet yesterday.
mt: Nilianza mchakato wa kupona jana.
ref: Nilianza lishe bora jana.

src: Sam and his wife were busy packing for their trip.
mt: Sam na mke wake walikuwa wakifanya kazi ya pakiti kwa safari yao.
ref: Sam na mkewe walikuwa na shughuli za kupakia kwa ajili ya safari yao.

src: Stan wanted to go on an adventure with Eric.
mt: Stan alitaka kufanya kazi na Eric.
ref: Stan alitaka kwenda kwenye safari na Eric.

src: Greg like to throw anything he could get his hands on.
mt: Greg anapenda kubadilisha yote anayoweza kupata.
ref: Greg anapenda kutupa kitu chochote anachoweza kushika na mikono yake.

src: Brad went to the beach.
mt: Brad alipita kwenye pwani.
ref: Brad alienda pwani.

src: Our puppy went outside to play.
mt: Kutoka ndani, mbuzi wetu alitoka nje kwa kucheza.
ref: Mbwa wetu alitoka nje kucheza.

src: Jerry had just learned to ride a bike and was excited to go for a ride.
mt: Jerry alikuwa amejifunza kufanya kazi ya kisikio na alikuwa na hamu ya kufanya safari.
ref: Jerry alikuwa amejifunza hivi karibuni kuendesha baiskeli na alisisimka kuendesha.

src: I decided to pay a visit to someone I've been dating online.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechagua kufika kwa mtu mmoja ambaye nilikuwa nimepambana naye kwa kushirikiana kwa mtandao.
ref: Niliamua kumtembelea mtu ambaye nimekuwa nikichumbiana naye mtandaoni.

src: I hired a social media manager.
mt: Nilimwajiri meneja wa mitandao ya kijamii.
ref: Niliajiri meneja wa mitandao ya kijamii.

src: Sam's parents were out for the weekend.
mt: Sam's wazazi walikuwa wamefika kwa wiki.
ref: Wazazi wa Sam walikuwa nje kwa wikendi.

src: Today was the first day of school.
mt: Leo ni siku ya kwanza ya shule.
ref: Leo ilikuwa siku ya kwanza ya shule.

src: Sam bought a new television.
mt: Sam alipata televisheni mpya.
ref: Sam alinunua televisheni mpya.

src: One day Matilda was extremely bored.
mt: Juma moja Matilda alikuwa na ugonjwa wa kujisikia.
ref: Siku moja Matilda alikuwa ameboeka sana.

src: Bill and Teddy were at the bar together.
mt: Bill na Teddy walikuwa pamoja katika bar.
ref: Bill na Teddy walikuwa kwenye baa pamoja.

src: Last night was very scary.
mt: Jana ilikuwa kama kuchukua dawa.
ref: Usiku wa jana ilikuwa ya kutisha sana.

src: Janey and Lynne decided to go to the movies.
mt: Janey na Lynne wakatarajia kujia ndege.
ref: Janey na Lynne waliamua kwenda kutazama filamu.

src: Oliva wanted to go shopping.
mt: Oliva alitaka kufika kwenye duka la biashara.
ref: Helen alitaka kwenda kufanya ununuzi.

src: We are moving to a brand new house.
mt: Hatuna hata ya kuhamia nyumba mpya.
ref: Tunahamia nyumba mpya kabisa.

src: Shawn woke and rose from the bed at 8:07 am.
mt: Shawn alipokwama na kujitolea kutoka kwenye kinga kwa masaa 8:07 asubuhi.
ref: Shawn aliamka na kutoka kitandani saa 8:07.

src: Nickie had a toy doll.
mt: Nickie alikuwa na duka la michezo.
ref: Nickie alikuwa na doli la kuchezea.

src: Anna has lost twenty pound in three months.
mt: Anna amekuwa akilazimika kwa masaa 20 kwa miezi mitatu.
ref: Anna amepoteza pauni ishirini katika muda wa miezi mitatu.

src: Bob wanted a hamburger.
mt: Bob alitaka nyama choma.
ref: Bob alitaka hambaga.

src: After being injured, Tommy needed to go to the doctor.
mt: Baada ya kujeruhiwa, Tommy alitaka kufika daktari.
ref: Baada ya kujeruhiwa, Tommy alihitaji kwenda kwa daktari.

src: Maggie wanted to paint her room.
mt: Maggie alitaka kuchapisha nyumba yake.
ref: Maggie alitaka kupaka rangi chumba chake.

src: Ken met a nice man online, and they decided to go on a date.
mt: Ken alijifunua na mwanamke mwenye uwezo mzuri online, na wakati huo wote wakafikia kufanya tukio la kufanya mapambano.
ref: Ken alikutana na mwanaume mzuri mtandaoni, na wakaamua kwenda matembezi.

src: Gary has a crush on Jamie.
mt: Gary ana uongozi kwa Jamie.
ref: Gary anamtamani Jamie.

src: Liz decided she was going to try to grow tomatoes.
mt: Liz aliamua kujitafuta kujenga matunda ya nyanya.
ref: Liz aliamua kuwa atajaribu kupanda nyanya.

src: Bill wanted a sandwich.
mt: Bill alitaka sandwici.
ref: Bill alitaka sandwichi.

src: Jack had his own pencil.
mt: Jack alikuwa na penzi lake.
ref: Jack alikuwa na penseli yake mwenyewe.

src: I went to the store to buy a phone.
mt: Nilikuja kwa duka kupata simu.
ref: Nilienda dukani kununua simu.

src: John was cooking dinner last night.
mt: John alikuwa anapika chakula cha jioni jana.
ref: John alikuwa akipika chakula cha jioni jana usiku.

src: Jenny found someone stole her lunch twice in the break room this week.
mt: Jenny alijua mtu alivyopata chakula chake mara mbili katika chumba cha kipindi hii.
ref: Jenny alipata mtu amemwibia chakula chake cha mchana mara mbili kwenye chumba cha mapumziko wiki hii.

src: Emma liked to paint.
mt: Emma alikuwa anapenda kupicha.
ref: Emma alipenda kupaka rangi.

src: Tom liked to look at old cars.
mt: Tom alikuwa anavyotaka kuangalia gari za zamani.
ref: Tom alipenda kuangalia magari ya zamani.

src: Johnny takes a trip down the stairs at his home.
mt: Johnny anapokwenda kwa barabara za nyuma katika nyumba yake.
ref: Johnny anasafiri kwenda chini ya ngazi ya nyumba yake.

src: Mike is a busy man.
mt: Mike ni mwanadamu mwenye kazi nyingi.
ref: Mike ni mtu mwenye shughuli nyingi.

src: My teacher showed us how to build a wooden bird house.
mt: Mwalimu wangu alishawahi kutoa ufumbuzi wa kujenga nyumba ya wanyama wa miti.
ref: Mwalimu wangu alituonyesha jinsi ya kujenga nyumba ya ndege ya mbao.

src: Josh liked watching anime TV shows.
mt: Josh alikuwa anavyotaka kushuhudia shughuli za televisheni za anime.
ref: Josh alipenda kutazama vipindi vya televisheni vya katuni.

src: John loves to eat at buffets.
mt: John anapenda kula katika mabibi.
ref: John anapenda kula kwenye bafe.

src: Jimbo has been working at the same job for Years.
mt: Jimbo anafanya kazi katika kazi yake kwa miaka mingi.
ref: Jimbo amekuwa akifanya kazi hiyo kwa miaka kadhaa.

src: Lester was infatuated with Christina.
mt: Lester alikuwa na wito wa kujifungua na Christina.
ref: Lester alivutiwa na Christina.

src: I decided I needed to finish a Sunday crossword.
mt: Nilisema nilizidi kufikia kufanya kuzi kwa jumapili.
ref: Niliamua nihitaji kukamilisha mafumbo ya Jumapili.

src: I thought about getting a new hat for my head.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechukulia kupata kofia mpya kwa miguu.
ref: Nilifikiria kuhusu kupata kofia mpya ya kichwa changu.

src: Julia baked a cake.
mt: Julia alitayarisha mkate.
ref: Julia alioka keki.

src: Whit has a dog.
mt: Whit ana mbwa.
ref: Whit ni mbwa.

src: Amy arrived home from volleyball practice and sat on the couch.
mt: Amy alifika nyumbani kutoka mchezo wa mpira wa vikivu na kushika kwenye sofa.
ref: Amy aliwasili nyumbani kutoka kwa mazoezi ya voliboli na kuketi kwenye kochi.

src: Today was Pinwheels for Peace Day.
mt: Leo ni Siku ya Pinwheels for Peace.
ref: Leo ilikuwa ni siku ya kutengeneza Vizungushaji vya Pini vya Siku ya Amani.

src: Beth was expecting her first child.
mt: Beth alikuwa anamwamini mwana wake wa kwanza.
ref: Beth alikuwa akitarajia mtoto wake wa kwanza.

src: Mia had never tried falafel.
mt: Mia alikuwa hajajitambua kufanya falafel.
ref: Mia hajawahi kujaribu falafel.

src: I was bored when my daughter went to Kindergarten.
mt: Nilikuwa na shida wakati mtoto wangu alipokwenda shule ya kwanza.
ref: Nilikuwa nimeboeka wakati binti yangu alienda Shule ya chekechea.

src: Gary always brought his lunch to work.
mt: Gary alitupa chakula chake kwa kazi.
ref: Siku zote Gary alibeba chakula cha mchana kazini.

src: Jake was trying to fall asleep.
mt: Jake alikuwa anajaribu kupata nishati.
ref: Jake alikuwa akijaribu kulala.

src: I was walking through the park one day.
mt: Nilikuwa nikitembea katika mazingira mawili.
ref: Siku moja nilikuwa nikipitia kwenye bustani.

src: Joe was interested in Einstein's General Theory of Relativity.
mt: Joe alikuwa na hamu kuhusu Teoria ya Kijumla ya Relati ya Einstein.
ref: Joe alivutiwa na Nadharia ya Jumla ya Einstein kuhusu Uwiano.

src: Bonnie needed a new job.
mt: Bonnie alitaka kazi mpya.
ref: Bonnie alihitaji kazi mpya.

src: Amy was playing in the back yard with her friends.
mt: Amy alikuwa akicheza katika kijijini na wenzake.
ref: Amy alikuwa akicheza nyuma ya nyumba na marafiki wake.

src: Jerry told all his friends he was running a marathon.
mt: Jerry alitupa habari yake kwa wenzake kwamba yuko kwenye marathon.
ref: Jerry aliwaambia marafiki wake wote kwamba atakimbia mbio za masafa marefu.

src: Dave loved the outdoors.
mt: Dave alivijivu na vikwazo.
ref: Dave anapenda kuwa nje.

src: Logan always loved being outside.
mt: Logan alikuwa na uangalifu wa kuwa nje.
ref: Siku zote Logan amapenda kuwa nje.

src: Skip's grades in school were getting worse and worse.
mt: Chakula cha Skip katika shule lilikuwa likipata kwa kipindi cha kipindi.
ref: Gredi za Skip shuleni zilikuwa zikiendelea kuwa mbaya na mbaya zaidi.

src: Rae's family sat down for Sunday lunch.
mt: Kabila la Rae lilikuwa lipo kwa chakula cha asubuhi.
ref: Familia ya Rae alikaa chini kwa chakula cha mchana cha Jumapili.

src: Gina and her friend Lisa were listening to music in the garage.
mt: Gina na rafiki yake Lisa walikuwa wakipenda muziki katika gari la kuchoma.
ref: Gina na rafiki yake Lisa walikuwa wakisikiliza muziki ndani ya gereji.

src: The kids were very excited about christmas.
mt: Watu wachanga waliwaza sana kuhusu kipindi cha kwanza cha kuzaliwa.
ref: Watoto walisisimka sana kuhusu Krisimasi.

src: I was feeling ill.
mt: Nilikuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: Nilikuwa nikihisi mgonjwa.

src: Christian's school was starting football tryouts.
mt: Shule ya Kristo ilikuwa ikifanya uchaguzi wa mpira wa kikapu.
ref: Shule ya Christian ilikuwa ikianzisha majaribio ya mpira wa miguu.

mt: Tim na Gina wote wakipenda kufanya kazi za kuchemsha.

src: Timmy asked his mother for a pet.

ref: Timmy alimwomba mama yake mnyama kipenzi.

mt: Jen alimtupa kaka yake Lee kwa daktari kwa kujaribu.
ref: Jen alileta paka wake Lee kwa daktari wa wanyama ili kuangaliwa.

mt: Mish alipata neno linalosema kwamba alikuwa na nafasi ya kuondoka sasa.
ref: Mish alipata ujumbe unaomwambia anaweza kuondoka sasa.

src: Gina was searching for her phone in her dad's car.
mt: Gina alikuwa anavyoangalia simu yake katika gari ya baba yake.
ref: Gina alikuwa akitafuta simu yake katika gari la baba yake.

src: Sarah had an appointment to interview for a job.
mt: Sarah alikuwa na wakati wa kuomba kazi.
ref: Sarah alikuwa na miadi ya mahojiano ya kikazi.

src: Linda and her boyfriend were hungry.
mt: Linda na mpenzi wake walikuwa wakipenda chakula.
ref: Linda na mpenziwe walikuwa na njaa.

src: Morris buys himself a skateboard to stay active.
mt: Morris anza kupata sketbord ili aweze kuwa na nguvu.
ref: Morris alijinunulia ubao mtelezo ili kuwa na shughuli.

src: Ron liked to drink a lot of beer.
mt: Ron alikuwa anapenda kula bia kwa wingi.
ref: Ron alipenda kunywa bia nyingi.

src: Jane wanted long hair.
mt: Jane alitaka kipande cha kiume.
ref: Jane alitaka nywele ndefu.

src: Alex awoke to bright sunlight.
mt: Alex alivuka kwa nuru ya jua.
ref: Alex aliamkia jua kali sana.

mt: Nilikuwa nimechoka chakula na marafiki katika mahali mpya.
ref: Nilikuwa nikikula chakula cha mchana na marafiki katika sehemu mpya.

mt: Carl alikuwa Florida na akifurahia siku yake katika nyumba yake.
ref: Carl alikuwa Florida akifurahia siku nyumbani mwake.

mt: Kweli, leo tulipokwama kwa baridi ya kawaida.
ref: Tuliamka asubuhi moja kwa theluji kidogo ikimwagika.

mt: Simba wa kifumbi alikuwa akifika nyumbani ya Joe.
ref: Kindi amekuwa akitembelea nyuma ya nyumba ya Joe.

src: Arnold bought a new television.
mt: Arnold alipata televisheni mpya.
ref: Arnold alinunua televisheni mpya.

src: Eric was barely a day over 21.
mt: Eric alikuwa kama siku moja zaidi ya 21.
ref: Eric ndio alikuwa amefikisha umri wa miaka 21 tu.

src: Ellie was at dancing as hard as she could at a new club.
mt: Ellie alikuwa akimwangamia kama alivyokuwa na nguvu kabisa katika klabu mpya.
ref: Ellie alikuwa akicheza densi kwa nguvu kadri awezavyo katika klabu hii mpya.

mt: Nilikuwa nimefika nyumbani kutoka kazi jana nikapata kipande cha kivinjari.
ref: Siku moja nikiendesha gari kutoka kazini nilipata pancha.

mt: Nilipata viatu vyangu vikali vikali.

ref: Marcus alikuwa ameanza masomo yake ya kwanza ya urubani.

ref: Larry ameamua kuwasaidia marafiki wake kujiandaa kwa sherehe.

ref: Mama ya Jane alitengeneza pai nzuri sana ya tofaa.

mt: Mark alitoka nje kwa kuchukua panga ya nyuma ya restorani.

mt: Jana juzi tulitaka kupata pizza.
ref: Usiku uliopita tulika kuagiza piza.

mt: Simon alikuta gari la kubeba kwenye nyumba ya jirani.
ref: Simon aligundua lori linalosonga mbele ya nyumba jirani.

mt: Johnny alikuwa katika timu yake ya Little League ya kijiji chake.

mt: Ben alikuwa mlimoni kwa masaa.
ref: Ben alikuwa amechelewa darasani.

mt: Ally alimwamini mwanaume wake aweke rangi ya kawaida.
ref: Ally alitamani mpenzi wake amchukulie pete maridadi.

mt: Nilikuwa na hamu sana jana wakati usher alitangaza nyimbo mpya.
ref: Nilisisimka sana jana kwamba usher alitoa wimbo mpya.

mt: Jamaa mpya wamechagua wimbo wao ili waweze kupata umaarufu kwa haraka.
ref: Bendi mpya ilitaka wimbo wao uwe maarufu kwa haraka.

mt: Annie alikuwa mwanamitindo mwenye kipa wa kwanza katika kikundi chake.
ref: Annie alikuwa mwanasarakasi bora katika darasa lake.

mt: Patricia alikuwa na mawazo yake wakati akiona mikroskopi.
ref: Patricia alistaajabu punde tu alipotumia darubini.

src: Lily never really enjoyed sports.
mt: Lily haukujifurahia sana michezo.
ref: Lily hakuwa akifurahia michezo.

src: Marisse went to the auction to look for some items.
mt: Marisse alipata mkutano kwa ajili ya kupata vitu.
ref: Marisse alienda mnada kutafuta bidhaa kadhaa.
