mt: Jumamosi, Jessica alipata kufika katika kampuni ya kujenga.
ref: Mwaka mmoja, Jessica alienda kambi ya majira ya joto.

src: Gina had gotten her phone back from a teacher.
mt: Gina alipata simu yake kutoka kwa mwalimu.
ref: Gina alikuwa amepata simu yake kutoka kwa mwalimu.

src: Meg couldn't find her favorite gold earrings.
mt: Meg alikosa kilele cha rangi yake ya dhahabu.
ref: Meg hakuweza kupata vipuli vyake vya dhahabu anavyovipenda.

src: Marcy wondered about the kids.
mt: Marcy alikuwa akisahau watoto.
ref: Marcy alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu watoto wake.

src: Ori's mom sent him off to the market.
mt: Ori's mama alimwambia Ori kufika katika shamba.
ref: Mama ya Ori alimtuma sokoni.

src: A week before Christmas, Abby and her family got together.
mt: Kabla ya kufika kwa siku ya Krismasi, Abby na familia yake wakati wa pamoja.
ref: Wiki kabla ya Krisimasi, Abby na familia yake walikutanika.

src: Maggie and her classmates went to a zoo for their field trip.
mt: Maggie na wale wenzake walipata kwa kushirikiana kwa safari yao ya kijiji.
ref: Maggie na wanafunzi wenza walienda katika bustani ya wanyama kwa safari yao ya kimasomo.

src: Vianna was a full-time college student.
mt: Vianna alikuwa mwanafunzi wa chuo kikuu kwa wakati wote.
ref: Vianna alikuwa mwanafunzi wa chuo wakati wote.

src: Everyone in my family got together for Thanksgiving.
mt: Wote katika familia yangu tulipambana kwa siku ya kupenda.
ref: Kila mtu katika familia yangu walikutanika pamoja kwa siku ya Shukrani.

src: Jim complained that his wife never did the dishes.
mt: Jim alikataa kwamba mke wake hakuwajibika kufanya kazi za kuchoma.
ref: Jim alilalamika kwamba mke wake hajawahi kuosha vyombo.

src: Lina has two kids.
mt: Linahitaji watoto wawili.
ref: Lina ana watoto wawili.

src: Anna wanted a banana milkshake.
mt: Anna alitaka mafuta ya kawaida.
ref: Anna alitaka sharubati ya ndizi.

src: I got into my car and closed the door.
mt: Nilipata ndege yangu na kuchomwa.
ref: Niliingia ndani ya gari langu na kufunga mlango.

src: Tommy recently landed a position on his school's Debate team.
mt: Tommy jana alipata nafasi yake kwenye timu ya mawasiliano ya shule yake.
ref: Hivi majuzi Tommy alipata nafasi katika timu ya Mjadala ya shule yake.

src: Jill was a high school student.
mt: Jill alikuwa mwanafunzi wa shule ya sekondari.
ref: Jill alikuwa mwanafunzi wa shule ya upili.

src: Alex was getting fits of dizziness.
mt: Alex alikuwa akipata kipinduzi cha kipinduzi.
ref: Alex alikuwa akipata matukio ya kizunguzungu.

src: Chris went shopping for a new car.
mt: Chris alifika kwenye duka la gari la kujaza.
ref: Chris alienda kununua gari jipya.

src: At a party on Friday everyone decided to play musical chairs.
mt: Katika kipindi cha jumatano wote waliamua kucheza michezo ya michezo.
ref: Katika sherehe ya Ijumaa kila mtu aliamua kucheza mchezo wa muziki wa kuzunguka viti.

src: Henry wanted to play a scavenger hunt for his son's birthday party.
mt: Henry alitaka kucheza mchezo wa kufundisha kwa siku ya kuzaliwa kwa mtoto wake.
ref: Henry alitaka kucheza mchezo wa kutafuta vitu kwa sherehe ya siku ya kuzaliwa ya mtoto wake.

src: Jake had a hard time making friends at his new school.
mt: Jake alikuwa na maswala mengi katika kujifunua na wenzake katika shule yake mpya.
ref: Jake alikuwa na wakati mgumu wa kupata marafiki katika shule yake mpya.

src: Sean was born into an Irish immigrant family.
mt: Sean alizaliwa katika familia ya wakoloni wa Wairland.
ref: Sean alizaliwa katika familia ya wahamiaji wa Kiairishi.

src: Todd was not careful with his electrical appliances.
mt: Todd alikuwa hajitunza vifaa vyake vya kielektriki.
ref: Todd hakuwa makini na vifaa vyake vya umeme.

src: Beth was making mashed potatoes from scratch.
mt: Beth alikuwa anajenga patatini kwa kwanza.
ref: Beth alikuwa akitengeneza viazi vilivyopondwa-pondwa kuanzia mwanzo.

src: John and Sue often kissed at school in between classes.
mt: John na Sue mara nyingi wakikosa katika shule kati ya masomo.
ref: John na Sue hubusiana mara kwa mara shuleni kati ya masomo.

src: Biff wanted to watch a western movie.
mt: Biff alitaka kuona filamu ya mashariki.
ref: Biff alitaka kutazama filamu ya magharibi.

src: After I got out of the bus, I walked to the front of the school.
mt: Baada ya kupata nje ya bus, nilipita kuelekea mbele ya shule.
ref: Baada ya kushuka kwenye basi, nilitembea hadi mbele ya shule.

src: Ashley's dog has fleas and is scratching himself.
mt: Kutoka kwa Ashley, mbwa wake ana kifua na anapiga kichwa.
ref: Mbwa wa Ashley alikuwa na viroboto na anajikuna.

src: I lived in the South End of Boston from 1968 to 1981.
mt: Nilikuwa nimeishi katika Kusini Mwa Boston kutoka mwaka 1968 hadi 1981.
ref: Niliishi Mwisho Kusini mwa Boston kuanzia 1968 hadi 1981.

src: My daughter had been begging for a pet.
mt: Mwanawe alikuwa akimwambia kwa muda.
ref: Binti yangu amekuwa akiomba mnyama kipenzi.

src: Kaylee always wanted a puppy.
mt: Kaylee alikuwa anataka mbuzi.
ref: Siku zote Kaylee ametaka mtoto wa mbwa.

src: Neil was backpacking Europe.
mt: Neil alikuwa anapanda barabara nchini Ulaya.
ref: Neil alikuwa akisafiri Ulaya.

src: Alice wanted to go to school to become a veterinarian.
mt: Alice alitaka kujifungua shule ili kuwa daktari wa wanyama.
ref: Alice alitaka kwenda shuleni kuwa daktari wa wanyama.

src: My laptop didn't want to work.
mt: Kipanya changu cha kompyuta hakikubali kufanya kazi.
ref: Kipakatalishi changu hakikutaka kufanya kazi.

src: My laboratory professor was explaining today's lab.
mt: Mwalimu wa lab wangu alieleza lab ya sasa.
ref: Profesa wangu wa maabara alikuwa akifafanua maabara ya leo.

src: Jack liked to take trips on the weekends with his friends.
mt: Jack alikuwa anapenda kufanya safari za wiki kwa wenzake.
ref: Jack alipenda kwenda safari wikendi na marafiki wake.

src: Brad was sick with a cold!
mt: Brad alikuwa na ugonjwa wa kipindupindu!
ref: Brad alikuwa mgonjwa mafua!

src: Barry had only one thousand dollars left in his bank account.
mt: Barry alikuwa na mafukara tu mmoja kwenye mkopo wake.
ref: Barry alikuwa na dola elfu moja iliyosalia katika akaunti yake ya benki.

src: Michael likes to go to the beach but has trouble swimming.
mt: Michael anapenda kufika pwani lakini anashindwa kufanya kazi za kujipamba.
ref: Michael anapenda kwenda ufuoni lakini ana tatizo la kuogelea.

src: Juan wanted to make tacos for his family tonight.
mt: Juan alitaka kufanya tacos kwa familia yake leo.
ref: Juan alitaka kutengenezea familia yake tacos usiku wa leo.

src: Lena was sick.
mt: Lena alikuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: Lena alikuwa mgonjwa.

src: Jim was farting a lot more than usual.
mt: Jim alifanya zaidi ya kawaida.
ref: Jim alikuwa akiharibu hewa zaidi ya kawaida.

src: Tim bought a new lamp today.
mt: Tim alikata kipande cha mawe leo.
ref: Tim alinunua taa mpya leo.

src: Sandy had taken dance for ten Year's.
mt: Sandy alikuwa akifanya dansi kwa miaka kumi.
ref: Sandy alikuwa amesomea densi kwa miaka kumi.

src: Gina and her friend Tami were walking to their classroom.
mt: Gina na mpenzi yake Tami walikuwa wakipita kwa kifani chao.
ref: Gina ma rafiki yake Tami walikuwa wakitembea darasani mwao.

src: Morgan loved tea.
mt: Morgan alivijivu chai.
ref: Morgan anapenda chai.

src: Beth started collecting dolls.
mt: Beth alianza kupata vitambaji.
ref: Beth alianza kukusanya madoli.

src: Jim was in a go cart race.
mt: Jim alikuwa katika mashindano ya go cart.
ref: Jim alikuwa katika mbio za go cart.

src: Bob was warm and tender towards his wife.
mt: Bob alikuwa mwenye uwezo na ujuzi kwa mke wake.
ref: Bob alikuwa mzuri na mwenye upendo kwa mke wake.

src: Ida had tickets to a two-day outdoor music festival.
mt: Ida alikuwa na tiketi za kufanya mazungumzo kwa siku mbili za muziki.
ref: Ida alikuwa na tikiti za tamasha la muziki la nje la siku mbili.

src: Jeff was walking home to only see a tornado at a distance.
mt: Jeff alikuwa anapita nyumbani kwake kwa kujifanya kufika kwa tornado kwa umbali.
ref: Jeff alikuwa akitembea kuelekea nyumbani alipoona tufani kwa mbali.

src: Charles was happy to meet a record company executive on Facebook.
mt: Charles alikuwa na furaha kutembelea mwenyekiti wa kampuni ya rekodi za muziki kwenye Facebook.
ref: Charles alifurahi kukutana na wakubwa wa kampuni ya kurekodi muziki kwenye Facebook.

src: Anna wanted to bake a cake for her mom's birthday.
mt: Anna alitaka kuchoma kifamfuo kwa siku ya kuzaliwa kwa mama yake.
ref: Anna alitaka kuoka keki ya siku ya kuzaliwa ya mama yake.

src: Ron had just found out that his family was moving to a farm.
mt: Ron alikuwa ameambiwa kwamba familia yake inakwenda kwenye kilimo cha chakula.
ref: Ron aligundua kwamba familia yake ilikuwa inahamia kwa shamba.

src: Ron has anger problems.
mt: Ron anasumbui.
ref: Ron alikuwa na matatizo ya hasira.

src: My friend and I decided to start a band and perform for our families.
mt: Rafiki yangu na mimi tulitaka kuanzisha bendi na kufanya kazi kwa familia zetu.
ref: Rafiki rangu na mimi tuliamua kuanzisha bendi na kutumbuiza familia zetu.

src: A boy Jack had been asking his parents to get a puppy for months.
mt: Kijana Jack alikuwa akimwambia wazazi wake kwa muda mrefu kwa nini wanaangalia kutupa mbwa.
ref: Mvulana Jack alikuwa akiomba wazazi wake wamnunulie mtoto wa mbwa kwa miezi.

src: On a cool Saturday afternoon Amy was in her backyard alone.
mt: Jumamosi mchana mrefu Amy alikuwa peke yake katika kambi yake.
ref: Jioni moja nzuri Jumamosi Amy alikuwa nyuma ya nyumba yao peke yake.

src: Jon loved the night sky.
mt: Jon alivifurahia anga ya usiku.
ref: Jon alipenda wingu la usiku.

src: Jack went on a trip to the store.
mt: Jack alifika kwenye barabara kuu.
ref: Jack alienda safari ya duka.

src: Jimmy climbed on to the counter while his Mom was distracted.
mt: Jimmy alipanda juu ya kibali wakati Mama yake alikuwa na shida.
ref: Jimmy alipanda kwenye kaunta wakati mama yake amezubaa.

src: Billy buried some treasure in his backyard.
mt: Billy aliketiwa mali yake kwenye nyumba yake.
ref: Billy alizika hazina nyingine nyuma ya nyumba yake.

src: My mom took me grocery shopping.
mt: Mama yangu alimwaga ndege kwa kujua nimechafuka.
ref: Mama yangu alinipeleka kununua mboga.

src: Mike always had Golden Retriever dogs when he was growing up.
mt: Mike alikuwa na mbwa wa aina ya Golden Retriever wakati alikuwa akiwa na umri mdogo.
ref: Siku zote Mike amekuwa na mbwa wa aina ya Golden Retriever alipokuwa akikua.

src: Joe got fired from his job.
mt: Joe alipigwa kibali kutoka kazi yake.
ref: Joe alipigwa kalamu.

src: Jimmy needed to learn to code for his job.
mt: Jimmy alitaka kujifunza kuandika kwa ajili ya kazi yake.
ref: Jimmy alitaka kujifunza mwandiko wa fumbo kwa kazi yake.

src: Rakesh decides that he would like to cook lobster for dinner.
mt: Rakesh anasema kwamba anataka kula nyama ya samaki kwa jioni.
ref: Rakesh aliamua kwamba angependa kupika kambamiti kwa chakula cha jioni.

src: When I was sixteen I learned to drive.
mt: Japo nilikuwa na umri wa miaka sita nilijua kufanya kazi.
ref: Wakati nilikuwa na umri wa miaka kumi na sita nilijifunza kuendesha gari.

src: Ron woke up and looked out the window.
mt: Ron alipokwama na kufika, alisimama na kufika kwenye jengo.
ref: Rona aliamka na kuangalia nje ya dirisha.

src: My brother loved candy.
mt: Kaka yangu alivijua chakula cha kulezi.
ref: Ndugu yangu alipenda pipi.

src: Brad wanted eggs for breakfast.
mt: Brad alitaka mayai kwa chakula cha asubuhi.
ref: Brad alitaka mayai kwa kiamsha kinywa.

src: Paulo had always wanted to serve in his student council.
mt: Paulo alikuwa anataka kufanya kazi katika majimbo yake ya wanafunzi.
ref: Siku zote Paulo alitaka kuhudumu katika baraza lake la wanafunzi.

src: Patrick's parents raised ducks.
mt: Wazazi wa Patrick waliwajengea mburudzi.
ref: Wazazi wa Patrick walilea bata.

src: Last night I attended a cocktail party.
mt: Jana jioni nilipata nafasi ya kuwakilisha.
ref: Usiku uliopita nilihudhuria sherehe ya kokteli.

src: I am a different person than I used to be.
mt: Nilikuwa mtu tofauti na nilivyokuwa.
ref: Mimi ni mtu tofauti zaidi ya vile nilivyokuwa.

src: Kelly went to a Celtics game yesterday.
mt: Kelly alifika kwenye mechi ya Celtics jana.
ref: Kelly alienda jana kwenye mchezo wa Celtics.

src: Jane's girlfriend works at a flower shop.
mt: Jane anamkubali kuwa binti yake anafanya kazi katika duka la nyota.
ref: Mpenzi wa Jane anafanya kazi katika duka la maua.

src: Michael loved to go hiking in the woods on weekends.
mt: Michael alivyelewa kuwa anapenda kufika katika maeneo ya mawimbi ya miti kwa wiki.
ref: Michael alipenda kwenda matembezi msituni wikendi.

src: Damon lost his wallet with his ID in it.
mt: Damon alipoteza kiti chake na kadi yake.
ref: Damon alipoteza pochi lake na kitambulisho chake kikiwa ndani.

src: David and Mia rarely got to go out since they had young children.
mt: David na Mia mara nyingi hawakutakiwa kufika nje kwa sababu wana watoto wachanga.
ref: David na Mia walikuwa wakitoka nje mara chache kwani walikuwa na watoto wadogo.

src: Bob was going to take his daughter to see Grandma.
mt: Bob alikuwa anatarajia kumpa binti yake kwa Bibi.
ref: Bob alikuwa akienda kupeleka binti yake kwenda kuonana na Bibi.

src: Sue's cat was nowhere to be seen.
mt: Kisu cha Sue hakikuta hata kwa kujifungua.
ref: Paka wa Sue hakuonekana popote.

src: Ava brought home a catfish.
mt: Ava alikwenda nyumbani na kuuza kambili.
ref: Ava alileta kambare nyumbani.

src: I love to go to the movies.
mt: Nilipenda kufika kwenye sinema.
ref: Ninapenda kwenda kutazama filamu.

src: I bought a new car today.
mt: Nilipata gari mpya leo.
ref: Nilinunua gari lipya leo.

src: Teresa was an artist.
mt: Teresa alikuwa mwanamitindo.
ref: Teresa alikuwa msanii.

src: My dog waited for me by the house front door.
mt: Kutoka nyumbani, mbwa wangu alikuwa amewaita nami kwa pumbwa ya nyumba.
ref: Mbwa wangu alinisubiri karibu na mlango wa mbele.

src: Matt found a puppy wandering down the street.
mt: Matt alikuwa ameona mbwa mchanga akimwaga waendelee kutembea katika barabara.
ref: Matt alipata mtoto wa mbwa akizurura barabarani.

src: Mike bought a new bike to ride in his town.
mt: Mike alibaki moto mpya kwa kutembea katika mji wake.
ref: Mike alinunua baiskeli mpya ya kuendesha katika mji wake.

src: Lucy placed a pan of food into the oven.
mt: Lucy alitupa chakula cha kuchoma katika jiko.
ref: Lucy aliweka sufuria ya chakula kwenye oveni.

src: Tim's history class was first thing in the morning.
mt: Kazi ya Tim katika historia yake ilikuwa kwanza kwenye mchakato wa asubuhi.
ref: Darasa la historia la Tim lilikuwa jambo la kwanza asubuhi.

src: Amy called her internet provider for help.
mt: Amy alipiga simu kwa msaada wa meneja wa mitandao.
ref: Amy alipiga simu kwa mtoa huduma wake wa mtandao kwa msaada.

src: Sam regretted not starting his history essay earlier.
mt: Sam alikataa kuhakikisha kwamba alianza kuchapisha essay yake ya historia zaidi mapema.
ref: Sam alijuta kutoanzisha insha yake ya historia mapema.

src: Doug and Molly decided to go the park to take a walk.
mt: Doug na Molly waliamua kufika katika mazingira ya kujenga barabara ili kufika kwa barabara.
ref: Doug na Molly waliamua kwenda kwenye bustani kutembea.

src: Bill's father told him to keep practicing his piano scales.
mt: Baba wa Bill alimwambia kuendelea na kufundisha alisikia.
ref: Baba ya Bill alimwambia aendelee kufanya mazoezi ya maandishi yake ya piano.

src: Carlos decides to take a walk to get fresh air.
mt: Carlos anataka kufika kwa baruti ili kupata hewa ya kawaida.
ref: Carlos anaamua kwenda matembezi ili kupata hewa safi.

src: Lance wanted to have a romantic evening with his wife.
mt: Lance alitaka kuwa na ushindi wa mapenzi na mke wake.
ref: Lance alitaka kuwa na jioni ya kimapenzi na mkewe.

src: Keith went to a pet store to see the animals.
mt: Keith alipata duka la wanyama kwa ajili ya kuona wanyama.
ref: Keith alienda kwenye duka la wanyama kuona wanyama.

src: Maria wanted to learn Spanish.
mt: Maria alitaka kujifunza Kiswahili.
ref: Maria alitaka kujifunza Kihispania.

src: Jay got stuck in an elevator on his way out of his office.
mt: Jay alipata kama alivyo katika lift wakati wa kutoka katika ofisi yake.
ref: Jay alikwama kwenye lifti alipokuwa akitoka ofisini kwake.

src: Ben was babysitting.
mt: Ben alikuwa anababu.
ref: Ben alikuwa akichunga watoto.

src: Ted always wanted to be a senator.
mt: Ted alikuwa na ahadi ya kuwa seneta.
ref: Tom amekuwa akitaka kuwa seneta.

src: Julie had a pretty pink ball that she loved to bounce outside.
mt: Julie alikuwa na mpira mwenye rangi ya pinki ambao alivipenda kubima nje.
ref: Julie alikuwa na mpira mzuri wa rangi ya waridi ambao alipenda kurusha nje.

src: The hubby and I decided to have a date night tonight.
mt: Wazake na mimi tulikubali kufanya ushindi wa mchana leo.
ref: Mimi na mume wangu tuliamua kuwa na usiku maalum leo.

src: Bob decided to hike in the jungles of Indonesia.
mt: Bob aliamua kufika katika maeneo ya barabara za Indonesia.
ref: Bob aliamua kutembea katika misitu ya Indonesia.

src: John had had a bike since he was 14.
mt: John alikuwa na biki tangu alipokuwa na umri wa miaka 14.
ref: John alikuwa na baiskeli tangu akiwa na umri wa miaka 14.

src: Kim had eaten deer meat without knowing what type of meat it was.
mt: Kim alikula nyama ya kondoo bila kujua aina ya nyama ilikuwa.
ref: Kim alikuwa amekula nyama ya kulungu bila kujua ilikuwa nyama ya aina gani.

src: Carl looked into a telescope for the first time at 9-Year's-old.
mt: Carl alitazama kwa mara ya kwanza kwa kipanya cha kisasa akiwa na umri wa miaka 9.
ref: Carl aliangalia kwenye darubini kwa mara ya kwanza akiwa na umri wa miaka 9.

src: Julie had a coworker named Barry who loved to make trouble for others.
mt: Julie alikuwa na mwajiri mmoja anayeitwa Barry ambaye alivuta wengine.
ref: Julie alikuwa na mfanyakazi mwenza anayeitwa Barry ambaye alipenda kusumbua wengine.

src: James loved to challenge himself physically.
mt: James alivuta kujitafutia kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia kwa kujitafutia
ref: James alipenda kujipa changamoto kimwili.

src: I was riding my bike to work one summer morning.
mt: Nilikuwa nimevamia kwa kiti cha bici kwa kazi mchana mmoja wa majira ya baridi.
ref: Nilikuwa alikuwa akiendesha baiskeli yangu kwenda kazini asubuhi moja ya majira ya joto.

src: Gina whispered to Mary in detention.
mt: Gina alisema kwa Mary katika mahakamani.
ref: Gina alimnong'oneza Mary akiwa kizuizini.

src: Daniel got home from a night out on the town.
mt: Daniel alipata nyumbani kutoka kwa ushindi wa usiku.
ref: Daniel alifika nyumbani kutoka sherehe ya usiku nje ya mji.

src: The cop pulled me over at night.
mt: Polisi alimwamuru kwenye usiku.
ref: Askari alinisimamisha usiku.

src: Melissa was tired of trying to get her son up for school everyday.
mt: Melissa alikuwa na shida kubwa kujaribu kumuweka mtoto wake kwa masomo kila siku.
ref: Melissa alikuwa amechoka kujaribu kuamsha mtoto wake kwenda shuleni kila siku.

src: Mark was a pro wrestler.
mt: Mark alikuwa mwanamitindo.
ref: Mark alikuwa mpiganaji mtaalamu.

src: Rex has always wanted to visit Argentina.
mt: Rex ameomba kufika Argentina kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Rex ametaka sana kutembelea Argentina.

src: Ken really wanted to play the organ.
mt: Ken alikuwa na hamu ya kucheza organ.
ref: Ken alitaka sana kucheza kinanda.

src: Jay and Bella loved fish tanks.
mt: Jay na Bella walivipenda maganda.
ref: Jay na Bella walipenda tanki za samaki.

src: May invited her friends for a picnic in the park.
mt: May alimwita wenzake kwa chakula cha jioni katika mazingira.
ref: Mei aliwaalika marafiki wake kwa mandari katika bustani.

src: Sandra had always wished for a pet turtle.
mt: Sandra alikuwa anamwamini kwa kawaida kwa peti ya mburududu.
ref: Sandra kila wakati alikuwa akitamani kobe kipenzi.

src: A group of children played marbles one afternoon.
mt: Kundi la watoto walicheza mabingwa mmoja kwa moja.
ref: Kikundi cha watoto kilicheza na marumaru alasiri moja.

src: Francisco was excited to become an accountant one day.
mt: Francisco alikuwa na hamu ya kuwa mwanachama wa wataalamu wa hisabati siku moja.
ref: Francisco alisisimka kuwa mhasibu siku moja.

src: Jessica wanted to feed the birds without buying feeders.
mt: Jessica alitaka kutoa chakula kwa wanyama bila kupata chakula cha wanyama.
ref: Jessica alitaka kulisha ndege bila kununua bibu.

src: Last Friday I ate lunch with my niece.
mt: Jumamosi mbele mimi nila chakula cha mchana na bibi yangu.
ref: Ijumaa iliyopita nilikula chakula cha mchana na mpwa wangu.

src: Betsy comes home late one night and wants to eat something simple.
mt: Betsy anapokwenda nyumbani mchana mmoja anataka chakula cha kawaida.
ref: Betsy anakuja nyumbani usiku mmoja na anataka kula kitu rahisi.

src: Han and Leia once fought in a great battle together.
mt: Han na Leia wakapigana katika mapigano makubwa yote.
ref: Wakati mmoja Han na Leia walipigana vita kubwa pamoja.

src: Gina was not supposed to use her phone in detention.
mt: Gina haingekuwa na kawaida kutumia simu katika mahakamani.
ref: Gina hakutakiwa kutumia simu yake akiwa kizuizini.

src: Jill had problems breathing one day.
mt: Jill alikuwa na matatizo ya kupumua siku moja.
ref: Jill alikuwa na matatizo ya kupumua siku moja.

src: Jan had to pick up her daughter after class.
mt: Jan alitaka kumpata binti yake baada ya kazi.
ref: Jan ililazimika amchukue binti yake baada ya darasa.

src: Sara was a dancer.
mt: Sara alikuwa mwanamitindo.
ref: Sara alifutwa mcheza dansi.

src: Pat takes a bus from New York to New Jersey every day for work.
mt: Pat anapata bus kutoka New York hadi New Jersey kila siku kwa kazi.
ref: Pat hupanda basi kutoka New York kwenda New Jersey kila siku kwa ajili ya kazi.

src: Todd played hockey.
mt: Todd alilinda mpira.
ref: Todd alicheza hoki.

src: Joan kept waking up from her roommate playing music.
mt: Joan alikuwa akijitokeza kutoka kwa mkezi wake akishirikisha muziki.
ref: Joan aliendelea kuamka kwa sababu ya mkazi mwenza anayecheza muziki.

src: A man named Pete got off of work.
mt: Mtu mwenye jina Pete alipata kazi.
ref: Mwanamume anayeitwa Pete alitoka kazini.

src: Clare wanted to go for a walk.
mt: Clare alitaka kufika kwa barabara.
ref: Clare alitaka kwenda matembezi.

src: Nina needed cash for a prom dress.
mt: Nina alihitaji pesa kwa kilele cha prom.
ref: Nina alihitaji pesa za mavazi ya dansi.

src: Gina and her friend Tami were walking around the playground.
mt: Gina na mpenzi yake Tami walikuwa wakipita katika michezo.
ref: Gina ma rafiki yake Tami walikuwa wakitembea wakizunguka uwanja wa michezo.

src: Harry was especially talented at computer repair.
mt: Harry alikuwa mwenye uwezo mkubwa sana katika kujenga kompyuta.
ref: Harry alikuwa na talanta haswa katika ukarabati wa kompyuta.

src: I've noticed a lot lately that people are scamming good requesters.
mt: Nilijua kama wengi wakati mwingine wanasababisha wizi kwa wataalamu wabovu.
ref: Nimegundua mengi hivi majuzi kuwa watu wanawatapeli waombaji wazuri.

src: Stacy bought a bag of chips.
mt: Stacy alipata kifuniko cha chips.
ref: Stacy alinunua mfuko wa chipsi.

src: Dana's mother came to visit for a week.
mt: Mama Dana alifika kwa miezi mawili.
ref: Mama ya Dana alikuja kutembelea kwa wiki moja.

src: Kendall was exhausted.
mt: Kendall alikuwa na uwezo mdogo.
ref: Kendall alikuwa amechoka.

src: When I was young we used to drive from Florida to Michigan yearly.
mt: Kama nilivyopenda miaka ya juzo tulikuwa tunatumia gari kutoka Florida hadi Michigan kila mwaka.
ref: Nilipokuwa mdogo tulikuwa tukiendesha gari kutoka Florida hadi Michigan kila mwaka.

src: Gill's favorite character was Columbo portrayed by Peter Falk.
mt: Gill's mchoro wa kibinadamu alikuwa Columbo aliyechora Peter Falk.
ref: Mhusika ambaye Gill alimpenda sana alikuwa Columbo aliyeonyeshwa na Peter Falk.

src: Chad wanted to bowl a perfect game.
mt: Chad alitaka kubofya kipindi cha kutosha.
ref: Chad alitaka kushinda mchezo mzuri.

src: He watched in anger from outside the window.
mt: Aliangalia kwa furaha kutoka nje ya vitakataka.
ref: Aliangalia kwa hasira kutoka nje ya dirisha.

src: Ivan got bitten by a mosquito on a forest hike.
mt: Ivan alipigwa na mungu kwenye safari ya hifadhi.
ref: Ivan aliumwa na mbu akiwa matembezi ya msituni.

src: Paige was a very good student.
mt: Paige alikuwa mwanafunzi mwenye uwezo mzuri.
ref: Paige alikuwa mwanafunzi mzuri sana.

src: One day, John met a cute girl named Jessica.
mt: Yakakati John alijua mwanamke mwenye upeo mchafu sana jina lake Jessica.
ref: Siku moja, John alikutana na msichana mrembo anayeitwa Jessica.

src: The flute that sits on the shelf covered in dust.
mt: Chombo cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba cha kuchimba
ref: Filimbi ambayo inakaa kwenye rafu iliyofunikwa na vumbi.

src: Maggie was scared and excited to go on the space mountain ride.
mt: Maggie alikuwa na wasiwasi na furaha kujifungua kwenye mlima wa anga.
ref: Maggie alikuwa na hofu na msisimko wa kwenda kwenye safari ya mlima.
